1.content:
Welcome to Piece of Mind. Chose a hypnosis story that interests you.

1. Enrolled: A guy crashes his car out in the middle of nowhere. Looking for help he finds a strict school for girls with a unique take on education but far too late he realizes they think he is a she and their newest student.

2. Worth a Listen: When Rob's ex-girlfriend returns some strange CD's he gave her, only Jamie is there to receive them. What should Jamie do with them?

3. Pokemon: Lost and Found: A lost and lonely Hypno discovers Ash and thinks he is his trainer, Ashley.

4. Stage Show: Guy and his friend go to a hypnotist show.
1.title: Piece of Mind

choices: Howard hurt his throat and head
Howard wakes up, but can't remember anything
Howard wakes up in an empty girl's room
Police arrive and mistake Howard for a girl that escaped the school.
11.content:
Howard couldn't believe it. There he was, driving late at night in the middle of nowhere and just when he needed it most, his phone died. He brushed his long, dirty blond hair out of his eyes and drove on, putting his phone in the light blue backpack that was sitting in the passenger seat. Having just finished high-school, Howard decided to take a year or two off before going to college and was in the middle of a road trip to visit his cousins back east. Without his phone's GPS, he had no idea where he was going. He drove down the long stretch of road, hoping that he might be able to find some place where he could charge it again when his headlights revealed a deer caught out in the middle of the road.

He turned the wheel hard, his foot slamming on the break, as he lost control of his car. Howard just missed the deer but ended up landing in a ditch, being tossed around the inside of his car, his vision going black.
11.title: Enrolled

choices: He steps out of the woods and walks down the road.
He stumbles farther into the woods, forgetting about the road.
111.content:
Howard came back to consciousness slowly, the first thing being was aware of was his breathing and with it, irritation. There was a mild pain in his breath and he didn't know why. The confusion stayed with him as he began to see his surroundings. In the distance Howard could just make out the sound of chirping that he finally realized were crickets which was mixed in with a light ringing in his ears.

He moved his arms and felt his neck, which felt tender but he didn't know why. That's when it all came back to him. The deer. The car. He slowly opened his eyes and saw that he was still in the car but he wasn't in the driver's seat.

He tried to get his he straight but it felt fuzzy. What was wrong with the car? Something was off. He looked around and with some effort, he was able to pull himself up. He climbed up out of the driver side window and slid out of the car.

Howard took the scene in. His car had landed in a ditch and flipped to its side. He didn't know if it was in that order or not. One of the headlights was still on, shining into the woods which showed something glinting in the light.

Howard walked over to it, distant in his thoughts. The glinting was the zipper of his backpack surrounded by broken glass. He picked it up at tossed it over his shoulder.

Broken glass...Howard looked down at himself. He knew he should be concerned but he really wasn't. It was like he was watching himself as an outside observer. He checked himself over, looking for blood. He didn't find any, nor did he find any cuts or rips. If he was in his right mind, he would have considered himself lucky that all that seemed to hurt was his throat and head...his head hurt?

Not knowing what to do, he picked a direction and started walking.
111.title: Howard hurt his throat and head

1111.content:
Howard stumbled through the woods in a daze. He knew he should be worried, but... It was difficult to focus.

Focus. Focus. He told himself. He couldn't focus, that meant that he needed help, right? Yes. Loss of focus, need help.

Howard clung to that thought... Help. Must get help.

Where could he get help? How could he get help?

A thought cut through his daze. he had been driving. There was a road. If he had been driving, maybe other people would be on the road. Other people would help him.

He now griped that thought tightly. "I have to get back to the road. People will see me. People will find me. People will help me."

He saw a clearing ahead and picked up his pace. He had found the road!

But now what? He was tired, still couldn't think straight, and his throat and neck hurt.

Ok. Road. Help. Find help. Which way?

Picking a direction, Howard starting stumbling along the road, backpack slung over his shoulder, looking for someone who could help
1111.title: He steps out of the woods and walks down the road.

113.content:
Only about a quarter mile away was the Mirania Academy for Troubled girls.

Some of the security heard the crash and investigated.

They found someone they assumed must be one of their new students, they treated her wounds all of which were superficial.

They transported her to the school and tried to find any information on new students.

"Oh I think I found her, her name is Hailey, short dirty blond hair, about 5'6 average build."

"Yep must be her, does it say anything else in her file The other replied

"Yeah, her parents sent her here, she's apparently a severe tomboy, doesn't even admit to being a girl, and her parents, want her to graduate as a proper young lady."

"Well they sent her to the right place, lets get her to her room to rest and contact the staff about her arrival"

Hours later Howard woke up in a strange room tucked into a girly bed in a girly room, he was dressed in girly pink pajama pants and a silky pink top.

He jumped out of bed.

"Good Morning Hailey, Welcome to the Mirania School for Girls" he heard a voice say
113.title: Howard wakes up in an empty girl's room

1131.content:
Howard, jumped, startled and turned to see a tall Woman dressed in a tight pencil skirt and blouse standing by the door.

"What's going on?" He asks confused "Where am I?"

The Woman laughed, as if it was a dumb question. "Just as I said, The Mirania Academy For Troubled Girls, where you belong."

"Academy for Troubled Girls? What? I- I was in an accident." He said bewildered.

"Yes, on your way here no less, we found you and treated you, only a few cuts and bruises that will be gone in no time, which is could, a proper young lady shouldn't have any marks on her face, Isn't that right Hailey?"

"Proper young lady...? Hailey? I'm not a girl, and my name's Howard." Howard argued

"Howard..." The woman said quietly, a made a small note on a pack of papers she was Holding. "Hailey even refuses to use her Female Name, recommended powerful estrogen doses, the sooner she has a more feminine body, she sooner she'll accept her femininity."

They had already decided to dose Hailey's food with estrogen, to help her accept that she is a girl, and a make her a lady, but that could take months, with stronger doses, she could have gained two cups sizes within a month,

"Hailey Desperately needed that, she was flat as a board." She mused.

She turned on her strict voice. "Here are the Rules HAILEY" she emphasized her name "You were sent here, to become a lady, and that is exactly how you'll behave while here, doing or saying anything, that any staff member deems un-ladylike, will net you punishments."

Howard was getting more alarmed by the minute. Was she serious, they actually thought he was a chick.

"I'm Sorry, there must be a misunderstanding, I'm really not a girl, or Hailey, My name is honestly Howard, and I just graduated High School."

That was recieved by a quick swat with a ruler to his hand

"Ouch, what the hell!!" He yelled in pain.

Another quick hit to his other hand.

"Ow Stop, Please" he said jumping back.

A lady speaks when spoken too and does not interupt, nor does a lady use Foul Language.

"Now, Get dressed, your uniform is hanging in your closet, and your class schedule is hanging on your door.

With that she turned and left, leaving Howard alone in his girly PJS to contemplate his next move.
1131.title: Its the Headmistress

11311.content:
All alone, Howard checked out the room, hoping his actual clothes were here, with no luck.

There was a window for him to sneak out of, but it was sealed shut, and he realized that it was morning, he must've been unconcious all night.

In the closet, was 5 pairs of identical dresses, a school uniform if he had to guess, along with a couple of other dresses, ranging from formal to casual, and a small selection of shoes as well, all heels.

"Man, they're seious about turning this chick into a proper lady, no pants or T-shirts at all, not even flat shoes."

Having waited long enough for the woman to have gotten out of sight Howard tried the door, planning on finding an exit and leaving this place.

Instead, it was locked, with no clear way to unlock it, he rattled the door knob and pulled hoping to somehow force the door open. Suddenly a speaker crackled over head,

"The Door will unlock once you are dressed properly Hailey, You have class starting in 20 minutes, you don't want to be late, now do you."

"I'm not wearing that! I'm telling you, I'm not this Hailey, you've got the wrong person, I was just driving through the woods."

In her office the Headmistress, makes another note. "Hailey, is quite combative, and may even be delusional about her own gender, Reccomend hypnosis, along with harsher and stricter feminity training. And with that she got up from her office and headed back towards Hailey's room, She was going to be a tough student but sooner or later She'd get through to her.

A minute Later, The bedroom door opened and before Howard could try to get out The Headmistress had entered and closed the door, with a wooden paddle in hand.

"It seems we got off on the wrong foot, earlier I'm the Headmistress of the academy, Bethany Smith, you can call me Headmistress, Mistress, even just Miss, if you like, I''m even alright with you calling my Beth or Miss Smith. Now, We have a very good track record of Delinquent girls coming in and proper ladies going out, you will do just the same, you may even thank me at your graduation, the only variable is how hard you make it on me and yourself."

He got interupted by Miss Smith, as he'd decided to call her, taking a quick step towards him, and grabbing his arm, she easily twists him around and has his arm behind you back.

"Ow... Howard... You're gonna break my arm."

He feels a hard painful smack on his ass, as Miss Smith gives him a hard spank with the paddle, and then four more, slowly

With his last shred of pride "I'm a guy, I can prove-" Another painful smack on his ass, then four more.

"Yes, I'll get dressed." Howard cried out, with tears in his eyes.

With that she helped him stand and made her way to the door

"I expect you dressed and ready in 5 minutes, I'll be waiting to walk you to class, we wouldn't want you getting lost on your first day, would we Hailey." and with that she was gone.

Howard stood still, rubbing his ass in pain, his arm hurt too, she was way stronger than she looked, she easily overpowered him, he was going to have to do as she said for the time being, until he got out of her sight. He opened the closet... If he did have any masculine pride left, it'd be gone once he'd changed.

Howard felt eyes on himself as he looked around. The girls were all looking at him and he suddenly realized why.

Howard hopped out of his seat and walked to the front of the class. He stood there awkwardly not sure how to handle this. He clasped his hands in front of himself, one hand over the other in a feminine pose he didn't know he was showing.

12.content:
Jamie woke slowly, rubbing the sleep from his eyes. It was early afternoon on a Monday and he was still in bed. After a stretch he brought himself to his feet and yawned.

It had been a few weeks since Jaime lost his last job at the local bookstore and hasn't been able to find another since. Without a job, he ended up losing his apartment as well, but luckily his friend Rob had been nice enough to let Jaime crash at his place for a while until he can get back on his feet.

Jaime thought that maybe he should start looking into another job but he wasn't that motivated. Rob had plenty of cash so there was no worry of him wearing out his welcome. The real problem, however, was that he has no marketable skills. The bookstore job was just inventory stuff, which he could do fine until they had to make cut backs. He wasn't too sure where to even start looking for work.

After using the bathroom and getting a shower, Jaime headed downstairs into the living room. There Jamie was shocked to see Judith, Rob's Ex. They had a pretty nasty break up after Judith had found out that Rob was cheating on her. She was writing something on a piece of paper and there was a package on the coffee-table. Jamie was thinking about sneaking back up the stairs when Judith finished writing and looked up.

"Oh, hi Jamie," she said blankly.

"Hey Judy," Jamie said uncomfortably.

"I was just dropping something off, could you make sure Rob gets it?" She asked while handing him her key to the house.

"Uh, sure," Jamie responded, taking the key.

Judith left quickly and Jamie was left to his own thoughts.

Jamie took a seat on the couch, picking up the package and giving it the once over. It was a large, thick envelope with the top ripped and inside were a few CDs, all numbered. He took up the paper that Judith had been writing on and read what she wrote.

"Rob,

I told you the last time we spoke that it was over and that I wanted nothing more do with you. You broke my heart and as much as I would love to forgive you, I just can't. I don't know what are on these disks, I couldn't bring myself to listen. Don't send me anything else. I mean it. So help me, I'll get a restraining order.

-Judy"

"Huh, a little harsh," Jamie said to himself. He put the note back down and leaned back against the couch looking over the disks. He was tossing around ideas in his head on what could be on the disks, the curiosity eating at him. Finally he stood up, deciding that he was going to find out what rob sent or it was going to bug him all day.

When he walks into the house, the phone rings. Jamie walks over to answer it.

"Hey Jamie, it's Rob, you're looking for work right?"

"Yeah..."

"The diner down the street from my office has a help wanted sign, wouldn't hurt to check it out"

"Great idea, I'll check it out tomorrow"

"Cool, I gotta get back to work, see you when I get home"

"Bye." Jamie says hanging up. "Wasn't that nice of Rob" Jamie thinks aloud, and walks to his room to update his resume.
1212121121.title: Home

12121211211.content:
You decide you should try to find something nice to wear, going through your closet you realize you havent had any interview worthy clothes for a while.

You decide to borrow something of Rob's he's got plenty of dressy clothes you could borrow.

you check his closet, and find, among Rob's clothes, are a few racks of Judith's clothes, a dress or two, a few skirts and tops and something your eyes lock onto.

A pair of women's slacks, and next to it, hanging a blouse, without even pausing you take those two, and hang them in your closet for tomorrow.

Not sure why you wanted those so much, you barely glanced at Rob's clothes.

Either way, you needed to start on dinner to impress Rob with the new you.
12121211211.title: Job Interview, What to wear?

121212112111.content:
You decide its time to make dinner to show that you're gonna start helping around the house more.

Checking the pantry, you find that there are noodles, so you make some spaghetti.

You finish just as Rob gets home, He's impressed that you made dinner.

After Dinner you clean up, and decide to go to bed early since you've got a job interview tomorrow.
121212112111.title: Make Dinner

1212121121111.content:
Jamie wakes up and gets in the shower. He decides that he should shave his legs and does so. Then he decides to brush his hair nicely, though it comes out looking slightly androgynous. He grabs Judith's clothes and puts them on. He realizes that he doesn't have any decent dress shoes to wear.

"Back to Rob's closet!" he says.

He finds a pair of black shoes, and in a rush to find something doesn't notice the 1/2 inch heel. He throws them on and gets onto the bus with his resume in hand.
1212121121111.title: The Next Morning

choices: A dress with a short skirt
A skimpy top, with booty shorts
12121211211111.content:
A few minutes later, Jamie's sitting in front of a man behind a desk.

Little did Jamie know that the boss had made the mistake of assuming Jamie was a girl, luckily he hadn't used any pronouns so neither knew of the mistake.

After answering a few question, and discussing his Resume, Jamie seemed to all but have the job, the discussion led to talk of a uniform

"would you have a problem wearing a uniform all waiters and waitresses wear a uniform, that you'd have to comply with."

"Heck I'll wear whatever you tell, me, I need the job." Jamie joked.

"Alright, well if you're free one of our waitresses called out sick for the evening shift, and we could use you." he says standing and shaking Jamie's hand.

"Sure, I'm free tonight. Around what time?" Jamie asked.

"Be here at 6, you said you were a small right, this should fit." he says taking out a package, its semi see through but all Jamie can see if the color of the uniform not what it is.

"alright" Jamie says, taking the package, leaving, and heading home.

Jamie sits down to relax, this was good, he had a job and he could actually be helpful again, he figured he should check out the uniform but decided to put it off until later.

Jamie, tidied up the house a bit, then watched some TV, before he knew it, he realized he should start getting ready. He opened up the package with his uniform, to find...
12121211211111.title: Onto the interview!

choices: It is a table with nice people at it
It is a table with rude people at it.
121212112111111.content:
Jamie pulled out the uniform and saw that it was a dress with a skirt that probably reached the middle of the thigh. He almost threw it down when he realized that he needed this job, so whatever he'll see if he can get a new one later. He paired it Judith's shoes and fixed his hair and left for work. When he arrived the place was pretty busy. He looked around when a woman calls him over.

"Hey you're the new hire right?" she says.

"Yeah, I'm Jamie" he says.

"Good, I'm your supervisor Karen and we are jam packed tonight. You're going to cover these tables okay?"

"Yeah, I got it" he says.

He goes to a chart and sees that the tables he is responsible for are tables 7-10. He goes over table 7 and...
121212112111111.title: A dress with a short skirt

1212121121111112.content:
The people at the table were rude. Really rude, Jamie wanted to just yell in frustration, but he didn't. He needed this job, he nodded and took their orders. The other tables were better. The night was tough, but he braved through all the rude people and the night was over. He was going to ask about the uniform, but his supervisor wasn't around.

"Eh, whatever I'll ask tomorrow." he said and left the restaurant.

He went home and took the uniform off and turned on the music. The music from the discs began to play again and he fell asleep.
1212121121111112.title: It is a table with rude people at it.

12121211211111121.content:
Jamie woke up and took a shower, and got changed into a casual outfit. He decided to eat a late breakfast and his phone rang during it.

"Hello?" he asked.

"Jamie, can you come into work again tonight?"

"Sure!" he said. "Oh, and before I forget, what's with the uniform?"

"If something's wrong take it up with the supervisor."

"Uh, sure..."

Jamie hung the phone up.
12121211211111121.title: The next Morning

choices: Jamie decides to get changed and head to work.
121212112111112.content:
Jamie opened up the package and laid everything out, there must be a mistake or something, the only thing here were a pair of super tiny booty shorts and a skimpy tank top, and black heels an outfit similar to Hooters, which made sense now that he thought about it, it was a Restaurant like Hooters, but they couldn't be expecting him to wear that could they?

It was lucky he had given himself some time to spare, after debating for a bit he decided to call the Restaurant and see if he could get this fixed.

He dialed the number and got a hold of the manager he'd talked to earlier, Matt was his Name.

"There seems to be some confusion... I'm a guy but you sent me home with a female Uniform."

"oh! I'm so sorry, I assumed you were a woman, with a unisex name and just a somewhat feminine shape, that's my mistake"

"So should I come in and get a correct uniform?" Jamie asked

"Well I hate to tell you we were only hiring females, we don't have any positions for guys right now, so If you could just return the uniform as soon as you can..."

Jamie was a bit sad, he'd been doing so well lately, a few days ago he was a lazy slob, now he was helping out around the house, he'd groomed himself and he even almost had a job.

Before he knew what he was saying he'd answered "Maybe It could still work."

"Pardon? what could?" Matt asked

"... I guess..." Jamie started, surprised that he was even contemplating doing this. "If it was alright with you I could work there... as a girl"

"Well this is quite irregular, but, if you're alright with doing that... I mean I assumed you were a girl anyways, with a bit of work that shouldn't be a problem."

Jamie was almost shocked with the answer, a part of him had hoped he'd say no, but he was giving him the green light.

Matt continued, "I'll keep it a secret from the rest of the employees but I'm going to have to tell our head waitress, she'll help you out, If you're sure you want to do this."

Jamie paused... Did he want to do this? wasn't this going a bit far for just a job, surely there had to be other jobs he could get... but for some reason his curiosity got the better of him, he wanted to know if he could pull it off.

"Yes, I'm sure, I'll be there at six"

Jamie hung up the phone and just thought for a while, he'd just not only agreed to work as a waitress, but he'd brought up the idea, where had that come from.
121212112111112.title: A skimpy top, with booty shorts

choices: Skip to the end of the shift.
1212121121111121.content:
Jamie looks at the outfit laying in front of him, he's got less than an hour until he's expected to be at work, so he'd better change.

He takes off his new jeans... women's jeans that is. keeping his panties, or as he's been calling them briefs, on and slides the tiny spandex shorts, with a bit of fiddling he was able to hide his dick between his legs, and between the snug fit of the panties and the snug shorts, it was pretty well hidden.

As he checks out his legs, he's glad that he'd decided to try shaving legs a few days ago.

Next he takes off his shirts and wiggles into the skimpy tank top, its clearly designed for someone with a bit more up top. He hoped that wouldn't be a problem.

He checked himself out in the mirror, he had to admit, while he didn't look like an amazing girl, he definitely looked more like a girl than a guy.

He quickly threw on a light jacket and a pair of sweatpants over his bootyshorts, embarrassed to be out in public wearing this stuff. he slips on the 4 inch heels that came with the uniform, and after many practice steps, he's at least able to stand up and walk in them.

Jamie gets on the nearest bus and listens to his Mp3 player as he rides.

Soon after Jamie tentatively steps off the bus, and entered the Restaurant, quickly finding Matt, who introduced him to the head Waitress names Megan.

Matt went back to work, and Megan, having not started her shift yet led Jamie to the back room.

"Matt told me everything, don't worry, I'm not judging, I'm here to help, since by the looks of it you don't pose as a woman regularly, Matt asked me to go out out and get you some breast forms and hip and butt padding, don't worry about paying, the cost will come out of your first two or three checks."

"Breast forms?! butt padding?" Jamie asks wide eyed.

"Of course, you won't get far working here with a flat chest and no ass. Don't worry, they weren't too expensive it won't cost you much, by doing this I know you're desperate for this job so you probably need the money anyways."

"I guess that makes sense, this is just a bit weird for me, since an hour ago I thought I'd be working here as a guy, I'm not sure what made me decide to try this out." Jamie said.

Megan handed Jamie what looked like flesh colored shorts and a pair of large breast forms. along with them she handed him a demi-bra

"Normally we don't wear bra's but I don't see any other way for the forms to stay on, short of gluing them to you, which I figured you weren't up for, oh and one last thing, I would've gotten you smaller breast forms, but since They would need a bra and we didn't want anyone else to know, I am laoning you one of mine, so the forms had to match, sucks for you cuz I'm and E-cup, one of the largest here. Sorry"

"Great" Jamie thought not only was he working as a woman, he was stuck working as a woman with rather large tits.

Megan told him to change into all that and she'd start training him. Jamie went to the nearest bathroom and slipped out of his shorts and slipped the hip/butt padding over his panties. Then he slips the shorts back on, with the extra layer, it puts even more pressure on his dick, its not comfortable, but it does look realistic, he's definitely got a feminine shape now.

Next the bra, clipping it on isn't all that hard, he slips the forms in and settles them in, before putting the tank top back on. The forms to a pretty good impression of real breasts, but damn are they heavy, Jamie can't imagine what it would be like to have them all the time.

Once he's changed he returns to Megan.

Megan began blending the forms into his chest to hide them, and then she started putting some makeup on him.

1212121121111121.title: Jamie decides to get changed and head to work.

choices: looks like Jamie doesn't have any clean clothes.
1212122.content:
Jamie beamed with pride, looking over his handy work. Everything in the house was now clean, everything but him of course. Looking at his soiled clothes, he decided that now was a good time to take care of that. After putting away the cleaning supplies, he made his way to the upstairs bathroom for a shower.

He hurriedly stripped, placed his clothes in the hamper and then jumped into the shower. He looked at all of the different soaps and washes that filled the shower as the warm water hit his skin. There were a couple of artifacts all over the house left behind from Judy and this was no exception. Seeing the different bottles that all did one thing or another were perched along the side of the shower, he wondered what they did as he tried to enjoy the water.

It was a nice reward for all of the work he had been doing around the house...work. He thought about that for a moment while using some of Rob's shampoo. He had been living off of the kindness of his friend for so long and how does he repay Rob? Sleeping late, eating his food and using up his toiletries.

Well, no more. Today I am going to start pulling my own weight around here. The cleaning was a good start, but more can be done. I'm going to head out and fill out as many applications as it takes until I get a job. At this point, I don't even care where I work.
1212122.title: Something Else

choices: Hypno walks into Ash's tent and wakes him up.
Hypno has doubts that Ash is his trainer.
13.content:
In a forest just outside of Celadon City, a Hypno stumbles around in the dark. He had lost his trainer a few weeks ago, Ashley, and was desperate to find her. This had been the longest that he had ever been from is owner and he wasn't taking it well at all. He grew up in her care since he was a little drowzee and had never had to survive in the wild on his own. He had many close calls and was very weak from the constant fighting. He had just gathered some leaves he intended to use as a makeshift bed when he heard voices in the distance. He wanted to sleep, but what if this was her? He used the last of his strength to bring himself to his feet and make his way toward the voices.

Not far from there, Ash, Brock, and Misty were making camp. It had been years since the three of them had been traveling together in Kanto but it felt nice to do it again and with Ash and Misty arguing, it felt just like old times again.

Ash had been feeling kind of uncertain about himself the last few months. He was thinking back to his adventures in Kanto and never realized before how many Gym badges he had never won through legal battles. That kept nagging at him until he decided to retrace his footsteps and re-challenge the gym leaders that he felt he never truly earned his badges from. He re-battled Brock who then invited himself along on his mini quest, and then the same happened with Misty.

They had finished putting up their tents and were sitting around a campfire eating something Brock cooked up. They were about one day away from Celadon City, where he planned to battle Erika. She had given him the rainbow badge after he risked his life to save her Gloom from a fire set by Team Rocket about seven or eight years ago.

Just outside of sight, Hypno was watching. His eyes darted back and forth to the faces sitting by the fire and he tried to focus his eyes. He looked hard, but it didn't seem like she was there. His heart sank and started to weep quietly when he heard the one with red hair speak to the one with black.

“You think you are all set for your battle with Erika, Ash?” Misty asked. Hearing the name Ash, Hypno stopped crying and looked again.

“Of course I am. That battle is as good as won.” Ash mumbled with a mouth full of food. Hypno stared at the black haired human. That couldn't be her could it? The height looked right and the hair was the right color but that voice didn't sound right and she would never dress like that.

“I'm not so sure, tell me, what are planing on wearing?” Misty questioned with a funny look on her face.

Ash raised an eyebrow, “The same thing I always wear and anyway why would that matter?”

“Oh, I was just thinking. Since you have been retracing your steps I thought you might have planned to get dressed up again, Ashley.” Misty giggled. Hypno could not believe what he just heard. The red haired human called the other one Ashley. If that was her, then they could be together again, pokemon and trainer. He wouldn't have to be alone anymore. Everything would be right again. Yes, yes. Why didn't he see it before? Of course it was her. He had found her!

Ash and Misty ended up getting into another fight while Brock and Pikachu wisely stayed out of it. It eventually ended with them both storming off to their own tents and Brock putting out the fire then turning in himself, all while Hypno watched.
13.title: Pokemon: Lost and Found

choices: In the morning, Ash introduces the gang to Hypno and they head off.
In the middle of the night, Ash realizes what Hypno did to him and gets help.
131.content:
Pikachu was just about to follow Ash into the tent when an excited Hypno came limping out of the brush. Pikachu, startled, arched his back and readied himself for a battle. Hypno, however, just shuffled passed him and went for the tent. Quickly, Pikachu dashed in front of the tent's entrance just before Hypno made it in. Not knowing what this pikachu's problem was and not wanting to waste anymore time, he dropped his pendulum and used Hypnosis. Pikachu did his best o fight it, but ended up succumbing to Hypno's attack. Before Pikachu even hit the dirt, Hypno was inside Ash's tent.

Standing before Ash's sleeping form, Hypno was overcome with emotion. He jumped on top of Ash and hugged him tightly and started crying again. They were together again, now he wouldn't be lonely any more. He'd never let her go. He and Ashley would be together forever. The sudden jostling quickly forced Ash upright. Ash felt someone crying into his neck, with strong arms squeezing him. Frightened, he grabbed a flashlight and turned it on relieving the shadowy form of a hypno grabbing him.

Ash tried to yell but couldn't find his voice as he tried to push the pokemon away. Hypno looked up with watery eyes not knowing why Ashley was acting like this. Did she not love him anymore? Then it hit him. The last she had seen him, he was still a drowzee. All the fighting that he had been forced to do had triggered his evolution. She didn't know it was him! It was ok, he could fix this. It would all be fine.

Once again Hypno dropped the pendulum that he used on Pikachu and used Hypnosis. Ash stopped struggling and grew still while Hypno chanted. Though he couldn't speak the human language, he had learned to use Psychic. He opened the bridge between their minds and spoke to him.

“Can you hear me?” Hypno asked.

“Yes.” Ash responed, his voice monotone.

“I am Hypno. I used to be your drowzee until we were separated. I have been searching for you ever since. Do you understand?” Hypno was hopeful that now that he had calmed Ashley down, she would remember him, even if he looked different.

“You are Hypno. You used to be my drowzee until we were separated. You have been searching for me ever since. I understand.” Ash stated with no emotion.

“Wake Up!” Hypno clapped twice and Ash started to blink. He shook the fog from his head and when he looked back, there was his Hypno sitting right in front of him.

“Hypno, your back!” Ash yelled excitedly as he reached out for him. Hypno jumped into his arms, ecstatic. He was so happy that she remembered him now. Of course if he was in his right mind, he would have known that had just created the memories, not resurface old ones. The thought never entered his head. All that was in his head right now was having things go back to being the way they were before he had is pretty trainer, Ashley, lost each other. In fact, he was going to make sure things were better than before. Now he was going to make sure Ashley got everything she ever wanted.
131.title: Hypno walks into Ash's tent and wakes him up.

choices: On the way, Hypno notices some other problems with Ashley.
1311.content:
That night was the best night sleep that Hypno experienced in a long time. He snuggled up to Ashley like he used to, with her arm embracing him. He was kept warm against her chest, but something was wrong. He realized that her chest wasn't as soft or round as it used to be, instead, if was much smaller. It was strange, but he would worry about that later. Her Hypno was back, so he could find some way to help her fix that later.

Both Hypno and Ash woke to the smell of Brock cooking breakfast. They did a bit of stretching and walked out of the tent, Ash just barely stepping on a still sleeping Pikachu. At about the same time, Misty stepped out of her tent, rubbing her eyes.

“Morning guys I hope you are hungry because I made a whole bun-” Brock stopped half way seeing a sleepy and disheveled Hypno.

“Oh, right. Everyone, I'd like you to meet Hypno. He used to be my drowzee until we were separated. He has been searching for me ever since.” Ash said, gesturing to Hypno. “He found me last night.”

“Well, the more the merrier. Here you go, Hypno,” Brock handed Hypno some food that he had prepared. “I wish I knew you were hear earlier, then I could have tailored your breakfast to you. I hope this is ok.” Hypno didn't know who the tall guy was, but he liked him.

“What do you mean you were separated?” Misty inquired.

“What do you think it means?” Ash spat while getting himself something to eat.

“So what, you just misplaced your pokemon? I've known for a long time that you were irresponsible but this is terrible. Did you even look for him?” Misty complained.

“Of course I did...I think” Ash said, feeling a bit confused for a moment.

Hypno was busy eating, so he didn't hear the words that were being said, but he did get the feelings behind them. This is the second time he heard the two of them going back and forth like this. He did not care for this red haired girl that was mean to his Ashley.

Ash and Misty bickered for a bit and once their spat subsided, they began eating. Hypno watched Ashley eat and was once again a bit confused. Her posture was wrong and she was eating very sloppily. She is bound to choke doing that. He is going to have to fix that for her own safety. Hypno looked over at the red haired girl and saw her sitting and eating in a proper manner while she was reading a magazine with a crabby on the cover. Though he didn't like her, she would have to do as an example.

Brock had just gone back into his tent when Hypno brought out his pendulum. Ash just glanced over at Hypno and quickly feel back into a trance.

“I want you to look at the red haired girl” Hypno commanded in Ash's mind. Ash obeyed, looking over at Misty. “I want you to study the way she holds herself. Now, I want you to try and do the same. Try and hold yourself like she does.” Ash sat up straight, put his knees together and crossed his ankles. Misty was oblivious to what was happening while Hypno instructed Ash to eat more daintily and not shovel huge chunks of food into his mouth. By the time Brock came back, Hypno had finished getting Ash to sit and eat like the young lady he thought he was.

“Alright everyone. Lets pack up and get a move on “ Brock said cheerily. With that, the folded up their tents and packed up their belongings. Pikachu had just woken up by the time they were ready to leave.

“Don't worry sleepy head, I grabbed you some food, since you slept in,” Ash said scooping up a groggy Pikachu. Hypno watched the display of friendship with some jealousy.
1311.title: In the morning, Ash introduces the gang to Hypn...

choices: They make it to Celadon City and everyone goes off to do their own thing.
13111.content:
The team set off on their journey to Celadon City, all in good spirits. Pikatchu, sitting on Ash's shoulder, was still in a haze after Hypno's attack and was still trying to shake it off. Hypno limped along with a grin on his face, holding Ash's hand. Ash couldn't help but notice hypno's limp.

“Are you alright Hypno?” Ash asked concerned. Hypno nodded but Ash was still worried. “Here, just get in your pokeball and we'll get you checked out at the pokecenter in Celadon,” Ash felt around on his person for Hypno's pokeball but couldn't find it.

“What, you lose that too?” Misty scoffed.

“No! I just can't find it right now,” Ash barked back.

A slightly exasperated Brock finally chimed in, “Come on you two, don't you think it's a little early to be going at it already. Just enjoy the smell of the air, the sound of the bird pokemon in the trees, the beauty of the...surroundings”

It was then that they all saw a lovely lady in a fancy dress walking in their direction. She was accompanied by an older gentleman in a suit. It didn't take Brock long to go into his normal routine.

He ran up to her and took her hands into his, “Hi, I'm Brock. I know we just me but I just wanted to tell you that you are beautiful and I was thinking that maybe, if you weren't busy, we could go out sometime and catch a movie then get some dinner and take a walk and get married and have some kids-” Misty grabbed Brock's ear and dragged him away, just like old times. The sudden outburst frightened Hypno and he took cover behind Ash's legs and hid his face.

“Oh, hello,” the lady said and curtsied to Ash.

“Uh, hi.” Ash said scratching his head. Hypno looked up at Ashley's back. That was rude of her, he thought, she should have curtsied. She told him before that it was proper manners, had she forgotten that too? Poor girl, being away from him must have done something to her. Well, Hypno was here now. Hypno would help her remember.

“Miss, we must be going if we are to make it back before sundown,” The older man said.

“Yes, of course. I'm sorry, we need to go.” She said curtsying to Ash again and then the both of them moved on.

“They seemed a bit distracted,” said Misty watching them go.

“Yea, it's too bad, I would have liked to get a battle in.” Ash said a bit disappointed. Ash picked up Hypno and held him so he didn't have to limp the rest of the way to Celadon City they started walking again.

Just out of ear shot the girl spoke to the older gentleman, “Oh Reginald, today is the day. I know we are going to find my sweet little Drowzee, I can feel it.”

Reginald responded, “Now don't get your hopes up. You have been looking for Drowzee everyday and there has been no sign of him. Maybe its time we stopped looking and you got a new pokemon?”

The girl stopped and turned, “Reginald! How can you say such a thing? He is not some thing that I can just go out and replace! I am going to look for him every day until I find him. If you do not wish to join me, then you can go back home and I'll search alone.”

“A slightly guilty Reginald responded, “I'm sorry, I only want what is best for you, Miss Ashley.”
13111.title: On the way, Hypno notices some other problems ...

choices: At Celadon City, Ash and Hypno go shopping.
131112.content:
Miss Ashley and Reginald disappeared into the woods while Ash and Brock continued to Celadon City. Misty trailed behind a bit looking back over her shoulder. She wasn't sure, but she could swear that she heard that the girl was missing her drowzee. Misty looked at Ash, who had Hypno in his arms, and thought, “Ash can be kind of a dummy sometimes but I've never known him to be so careless about his pokemon. Not only did he misplace Hypno, but he didn't even go out looking for him? Now that I think about it, that's really out of character for him. If something did happen like that did happen, he would have been out there looking just like that girl.”

“Hey Ash, when was it that you and Hypno got separated?” Misty questioned.

“Look, I feel bad enough as it is, you don't have to rub it in!” Ash yelled back.

“I just want to know, when was it?” Misty continued.

“Come on Misty, give it a rest,” Brock added, tired of their fighting.

She was quite for a bit but she couldn't shake this uncomfortable feeling. She just had to be sure. “You guys go on with out me, I need to check something. I'll meet you guys at the Celadon Pokecenter at 2:30 tomorrow.” she said, then took off after the two travelers.

“What do you think that was about?” Brock asked Ash, looking back at Misty.

Not turning around, Ash just said, “No idea, girls are weird.”


- - - - -


It took Misty longer to find the pair than she expected but eventually, she caught up to them.

“Hey, wait up!” Misty called out to Miss Ashley and Reginald.

“Hello again, can we help you?” Miss Ashley asked a panting Misty.

“I think so *breath* you said you were looking for your drowzee, right?” Misty weezed.

“Yes, did you see him?” Miss Ashley asked hopefully.

“I'm not sure. When did you lose him?” Misty inquired.

“He wondered off into the woods by himself almost three weeks ago. He would sneak out sometimes to battle wild pokemon. I've tried so hard to give him toys to entertain him with, I would take im for walks in a stroller, I'd enter him into contests but no matter how I tried, he still would go out to fight. He is so fragile, I hate that he puts himself into danger like that. What if...what he really got hurt this time.” Miss Ashley started to tear up.

“Pokemon are very strong creatures, I sure he could take care of himself,” Misty tried to comfort Miss Ashley.

“Not my Drowzee. You see, when I was younger, Mother and Reginald took me to a store to buy my first pokemon. I was ever so excited that I hardly slept the night before. The owner showed me so many impressive looking pokemon, I didn't know what to pick. When we got to the pen of drowzees there was just one. The owner told us that he was the runt of the litter and the last one from that batch of eggs. It turned out that one of his leg's never fully developed while in his egg but I didn't care. My mother tried to talk me out of it, but I made my decision. He needed someone and I needed him. He's my best friend, and that's why I wouldn't let him fight, I don't want anything to happen to him.” Sniffed a watery eyed Miss Ashley.

“I'm not 100% but I think I know were your pokemon is,” Misty said, thinking back to the Limping Hypno.


- - - - -


Brock and Ash were not too far from the city when Brock asked if they could take a quick break. After carrying both Pikachu and Hypno, Ash was happy to sit down for a little bit. Brock walked off by himself while Ash sat on a log, putting Pikachu and Hypno down on either side of him. Though Hypno enjoyed being in Ashley's arms again, she really jostled him around while she was walking. Not smooth and graceful like normal.

“Not much longer guys, then we can rest in the city.” Ash said to his pokemon. The city, Hypno thought, they were bound to me a lot of people there and he still hadn't helped Ashley remember her manners. He pulled out his pendulum and shook Ash's arm. Ash looked over and once again, was in a trance.

“I want you to think a back to the last time you saw someone curtsey. When you introduce yourself to people, I want you to curtsey and greet them sweetly, okay?” Ash nodded in understanding after thinking about meeting miss Ashley. That's good, now she won't accidentally be rude to people. Thinking about it, Hypno decided that now would be a good time to help her with her gracefulness as well. “I would also like you to move more gracefully. When ever you walk and move, try and be as ladylike as you can, understand?” Again Ash nodded. Pleased that he was being so helpful, Hypno released Ashley from her trance.

Once Ash was free, he instantly sat up and crossed his legs at the knee. He placed one hand on his knee and brushed a bit of hair behind his ear.
131112.title: Misty heard Miss Ashley

1311121.content: What do they go shopping for
1311121.title: At Celadon City, Ash and Hypno go shopping.

choices: Maybe Something for May, Dawn or Serena
13111212.title: Clothes

choices: Hypno puts Pikachu in a trance
1311122.content:
Hypno beamed, happy with himself that he was aiding Ashley. She was steadily acting like her old self again. Hypno had just put his pendant down when he saw a flash. Quickly, he hopped to his side, just barely avoiding getting struck by an arch of electricity. Before he could recover his balance, he was struck by a yellow blur. Hypno landed on his back, his pendant flinging from his hand, while he felt a sudden weight on his chest. Pikachu hovered over Hypno, cheeks sparking. Hypno struggled to get free while Pikachu demanded to know what he did to Ash.
"Pikachu, Stop!" Ash called, drawing Pikachu's attention.

Hypno saw his chance and used Headbutt on the distracted electric mouse. Pikachu fell back, caught off-guard, and Hypno stumbled toward his pendant. After a quick head shake, Pikachu took after Hypno with Agility.
Ash tried his best to leap after Pikachu before this fight got any worse, but the only thing he caught was a face and front full of mud as Pikachu slipped right past his fingers.
Pikachu was almost ready for another Quick Attack when Hypno made a desperate use of Disable. With his Agility suddenly disabled, Pikachu lost his footing and slid in the mud, slipping a few times before getting enough traction to chase after Hypno again. Just as Hypno grabbed his pendant he was struck by a Thunderbolt. Disoriented, he mad a wild blast with a Psybeam which Pikachu dodged. Hypno tried to set off a Confusion attack, but Pikachu shook it off. Hypno tried another Psybeam but Pikachu Slam attacked him before he could fire it. Pikachu was just about to make another Slam when Ash was finally able to grapple his pokemon.
"What has gotten into you?" Ash asked fighting the squirming Pokemon.
1311122.title: Hypno and Pikachu Battle!

choices: They make it to the city
13111222.content:
Ash held Pikachu until he finally settled down, while Hypno looked on catching his breath. Hypno didn't know what sparked the battle, but he couldn't help being impressed by the little pokemon. The Pikachu was very strong, much stronger than he was, and he found himself admiring the small electric pokemon. Hypno always wanted to be a great battler, that's why he went off alone in the first place. Ashley would never let him fight because of his leg, but he knew that could do it if they started training like she had obviously been training Pikachu.

"Why did you attack Hypno?" Ash asked while mud dripped off his nose. Pikachu tried to explain that he saw Hypno doing something to him, but Hypno cut in that he was just trying to help her. Pikachu and Hypno kept going back and forth, talking over each other, leaving Ash with a garbled mess of noise.

"That's enough!" Ash shouted, silencing the two of them. "I know its been awhile since Hypno has been with us but he is back now. He is part of our group so I don't want to see anymore of this fighting, understand?" Pikachu grumbled a reluctant agreement, glaring at Hypno. Pikachu didn't know what was going on but he wasn't going to forget about this either. Until he knows what to do, he'll have to keep an eye on Hypno.

"Is everything alright?" Brock asked, jogging over to them after exciting the woods. Brock looked over the muddy trio, "I thought I heard a battle."

"Yea, but that's taken care of now." Ash spat out, placing a hand on his cocked hip. "You ready? Apparently, we need to hit a bathhouse or something." It was then that Ash noticed something in the mud. Daintily picking it up, it was revealed to be a pair of his jeans that were in his bag. Looking around, he saw more articles of clothing strewn about. He took off his backpack and was annoyed to find it empty, with a big hole in it.

"Ugh, and now all of my clothes need to be washed." Ash huffed trying to gather everything up.
13111222.title: Aftermath

choices: The lady at the desk isn't sure of Ash's gender.
131112221.content:
The buildings tower over the four travelers as they enter Celadon City. Though Ash was still fairly aggravated by the impromptu battle between Pikachu and Hypno, he knew that he had to calm down so that he could think clearly once he re-challenge the Celadon gym leader. It had been a long time since Ash had visited this city to challenge Erika for the Rainbow Badge but the memories were still fresh in his mind. The perfume, the disguise, and the fire that he had rescued Erika's Gloom from.

“Hear we are, Marina's Bathhouse,” Brock stated merrily, shaking Ash from his thoughts. The bathhouse is a simple building, white on the outside walls with thick wooden trim. Inside's much the same except hanging on the walls are cute little paintings of water pokemon playing. In the center of the main entrance is a large desk with an older looking woman sitting behind it, reading a book of some kind. Behind her are a bunch of shelves with assortments of toiletries.

“Here,” Ash said to Brock while holding out his soiled backpack. “Do you think you could find somewhere to wash my clothes?”

Seeing how aggravated Ash was acting recently, he figured it be nice to give him one less thing to worry about. “Sure, would you like me to hold on to your pokemon, too?”

“Thanks, here you go,” He said handing Brock his pokeballs. “I'll keep Pikachu and Hypno with my, they need to get cleaned up anyway.”

With a nod, Brock is on his way out the door and Ash turns to approach the woman at the front desk. When he turns, however, he bumps right into a very large woman that had cut in line in front of him.

The woman turns to Ash, a displeased look on her face, holding a small tray of cleaning products. “Well?” she says blankly.

“Well, what?” Ash says raising an eyebrow.

“Aren't you going to say excuse me?”

“Why should I? I never would have bumped into you if you didn't cut in line.”

“Hmph, you should learn some manners, little boy.”

The woman hit a sore spot and Ash was boiling, again. Though he was no longer a child, he wasn't the tallest guy and still had a slight frame, which he had always been a bit sensitive about. “What! I'm not a little boy!You're the one that should learn some manners!”

Hypno pulled at Ashley's pant leg, trying to get her attention. He didn't know why she was acting so aggressively and wanted her to stop yelling. She seemed to get really upset at being called a boy

Ash looked down at at Hypno and saw that he looked upset. Kneeling down, Ash patted him on the head to comfort him, “It's alright big guy.”

The woman took this time to disengage from the argument and by the time Ash was done reassuring Hypno, she had slipped into the woman's changing room.
131112221.title: They make it to the city

1311122211.content:
Now that the larger woman was gone, Ash walked up to the older lady sitting behind the counter. She smiled at the trio, adjusting her glasses.

"Hello," Ash said with with a sweet smile and a curtsy, which please Hypno.

"Welcome, I'm Marina," She leaned in close to get a better look. "You've been training hard, huh?" she said seeing the state they were in. Poor girl looks like she has been working herself ragged, she thought to herself.

A grumpy Ash placed some poke-dollars on the counter and responded with a exasperated, "You could say that."

Cheerfully, Marina began collecting towels, scented soaps, lotions, brushes, and anything else you could thing of. One by one, she placed them into Ash's hands,growing the pile until it was obscuring his vision.

Ash gave a muffled, "thank you," and carefully walked in the general direction of the men's wash room.

"A little to your left, dear," Marina called out, seeing where Ash was going and directing him to the woman's washroom, the door to which Hypno dutifully opened for Ash to enter.

After the door closed, Marina went back to her book saying only, "What a nice girl."
1311122211.title: The lady at the desk isn't sure of Ash'...

13111222111.content:
The changing area was empty, people had already moved to their individual washing stalls. As Ash put the things Marina gave him on a bench, he took a quick look around; the room was white with powder blue lockers along the walls, each of which was numbered. Amongst the items that Ash was given was a long chain with a key attached. On the key, was the number 15, and after looking around the room, ash found the corresponding locker.

Ash disrobed, put his clothes into the locker and then quickly looked for something to cover himself with in the pile he place on the bench. He found a white bathrobe with a very faded red trim and quickly put it on. The robe fell very short on him, hanging well above the knee. Ash sat on the bench, crossing his legs, and sorted the bathing items. He gave both Pikachu a washcloth to hold and Hypno a basket of cleaning supplies. Collecting what was left, Ash headed out to the bathing area with his two pokemon following behind.

The bathing area was a bit hard to navigate due to a great deal of steam in the air wafting about. Luckily, Ash was able to find a an empty stall quickly enough. Once inside he hung up the robe then sat down on a stool that was provided. Ash called Hypno over and began washing the mud out of his fur. First he was rinsed with warm water then with Pikachu's help, began sudsing him up with shampoo. After another rinse of warm water it was Pikachu's turn to get cleaned.

Hypno saw Ashley had started to work on Pikachu, so he looked in the basket, and saw all of the things that Ashley liked to use for when she bathed. Hypno took it upon himself To help Ashley like she just helped him. He lathered her up with some scented soap then began to shampoo her hair. Her hair was much more bristly than normal, and he hoped the shampoo would make it soft and silky like he knows she likes. It was while Ashley hair was in suds, Hypno saw how hairy her body had gotten. He knew, however, what bottle she used to get rid of it. Applied it to her skin with a brush, careful not to get any on himself and scrubbed off the hair from her body.

While shampooing Pikachu, Ash heard a familiar voice. It was the rude lady that he was arguing with that he bumped into.

"Why is she in the wrong room?" Ash said to himself. He listen closely then heard other voices, also belonging to women. Slowly it dawned on him.

"I can't stay here, I have to get out before she sees me." as exclaimed in a panicked whisper.

Hypno heard how upset Ashley was and tried to calm her down, but she wasn't listening. He knew the best way to help her, however, and once again used his trusty pendant. Like each time before, she was went stiff her eyes went blank.

"You have as much right to be here as she does," Hypno tried to explain, not realizing that it was coming off as a command.

"I have as much right to be here as she does," Ashley repeated in a monotone.

"That's right. Don't worry about what she thinks. Now lets finish here, and enjoy the bath for a while." Hypno suggested. Ashley repeated him again and then Hypno released the hold.

Ash shook his head then continued to shampoo the unaware Pikachu. He knew that he was upset before but couldn't remember why. It was something about they rude lady seeing him here, but that didn't make any sense. Sure he was in the woman's wash room, but he has as much right to be here as she does, he thought to himself. He didn't dwell on it, instead he finished up Pikachu and rinsed himself off. He put the Robe back on and was surprised at how soft it was.

They gathered their things and headed to the bath. The rude lady had just exited her on stall and saw Ash glide by in the white and pink robe, brushing his silken hear out of his eyes. Ash payed her no mind as he daintily stepped past her. The woman's face turned red, not with anger but with embarrassment for calling this poor girl a boy earlier.
13111222111.title: In the wash room.

131112221111.content:
The trio exited the bathing area and came to the real center piece of the bath house, the hot spring. Ash want not sure if the spring was naturally occurring, but none the less was looking foreword to a nice relaxing soak. The room was filled with vapor from the hot water, which obscured the shapes of the women that were already there. Lucky for Ash, that also meant that there was little chance of someone seeing him and getting upset at his presence. Of course Ash wasn't thinking about that, nor was he thinking about how he was in the wrong side of the spring; all that was on his mind was enjoying the bath for a while.

Ash disrobed and placed everything he had in a neat pile just out of reach of the water. Once convinced the robe wouldn't get too wet, he slipped into the water with his Pokemon. He rested his head on the edge of the spring and closed his eyes, letting the heat wash over him while his mind drifted. As it usually does, his mind settled on thoughts of pokemon.

"Erika is known for her grass type pokemon, like her Gloom. Fire or Ice moves would be really good against her...but she might be expecting that," Ash thought out loud as he was making his battle plan for his upcoming gym match. He looked over at Pikachu and Hypno setting next to him in the spring. Hypno was all smiles, playfully splashing Pikachu while Pikachu didn't look too amused. Ash pulled Hypno away from the grumpy mouse pokemon and put himself between them.

"I don't think Pikachu is in the the mood to play right now," Ash said with a smile. Ash looked at Hypno and thought for a moment.

"You know, Gloom isn't just a Grass type pokemon, it's also a Poison type. Actually, now that I think about it, a lot of Grass types are also Poison types," Ash said with a wry smile while Hypno and Pikachu just looked up confused.

"That settles it, You and I are going to beat the Celadon City Gym," he stated grining at Hypno.

Hypno wasn't expecting to hear that coming from Ashley as she never let him battle before. Tears began welling up in his eyes as a huge smile appeared on his face. He gave Ashley a big hug then started bouncing and splashing around, unable to contain his joy. Pikachu couldn't help but smile, seeing just how happy Hypno was.

Hypno was still beaming when they made their way back to the locker room. Ash was glad to see Hypno was excited for the fight but something was bothering him. He was coming up with some ideas on how to use Hypno's strengths to their advantage, but it felt like this was the first time that he was thinking about it. It was almost like they never battled together before.

"Excuse me," A voice called from behind and Ash turned to see the lady that he had the spat with earlier.

"Hi, I uh... just wanted to say that I'm sorry about earlier. I was rude, it was uncalled for and I'm sorry."

"Okay..." Ash said a little taken aback.

"I'm Nora, by the way"

Ash curtsied in the pink bath robe, "Ash."

"Anyway, I have to go. Again, I'm really sorry. Oh, wait," She stopped and reached in to her purse then pulled out a small piece of paper and handed it to Ash.

"Here is my card, come by later. It's on me," She said with a nervous smile.

"Thanks," he said as she left. He didn't know why she was being so nice but again, he couldn't bring himself to worry about what she thought. He looked down at the card which just said "Nora's" and had an address.

"Well that's descriptive."
131112221111.title: In the Bath

choices: Let's go to the Pokémon Center.
How about a Hair Salon? My hair is starting to spike up.
1311122211111.content:
Ash feels like it's about to leave, and so he goes back to his locker, which he finds is unlocked. Did he forget to lock it? Either way, Ash's clothes were missing! It seems like someone else has left their clothes in his locker.

Hypno, upon seeing his beloved Ashley's confused face, peers into the locker. What Hypno sees delights him. It appears as though someone has left clothing that Ashley used to wear! How nice of the person who left these.

Of course, Hypno didn't know that these clothes actually belonged to the real Ashley, who had just passed by Ash unaware of him.

"Well, it looks like my clothes are missing guys. I don't know what to do about this. I can't very well go outside wearing nothing... but I can't just take these clothes." Ash said, with an air of sadness.

Hypno was confused at this, these clothes were so similar to the clothes Ashley usually wears, so why isn't she just putting them on? Then it hits him. Of course! Ashley must've forgotten that these are her clothes. He would help her remember. He pulled out his trusty pendulum... and just like the many times before, put Ash into a hypnotized state.

"These clothes belong to you, of course. Never mind those old silly clothes, these are your favorites!" Hypno said, not knowing how commanding his tone was.

"Of course! How could I have forgotten. These ARE my clothes, I should just get changed into them." Ash said, snapping out of the hypnosis.

Pikachu, on the other hand, wasn't having any of this. His trainer wasn't like this! He would make Ash see what this Hypno was doing. Pikachu tugged on Ash's leg.

"Yeah Pikachu? What's wrong, buddy?" Ash said in response.

Pikachu tried to explain to Ash that he was not acting right, and that he was about to put on girl's clothing.

"Huh? But these are my favorites... are you sure Pikachu? I don't think they're meant for girls". Ash replied.

Hypno could see that Ashley's Pikachu was acting strange. Then Hypno realized. This Pikachu must've met his dear Ashley when she was struggling with her identity! This Pikachu only knew the strange Ashley who called herself "Ash" all the time. Hypno wondered why Ashley wouldn't respond to her own name too, he'd have to fix that. So many things he had to help her with.

He pulled out his trusty pendulum again, and put both Ash and Pikachu under his spell.

"I've been a bit concerned about you two. For one, Pikachu thinks you're a boy of all things, and secondly you never respond to Ashley. You need to remember that you're a girl! And start using your real name. No more of this "Ash" thing. You are Ashley! Pikachu, try and remember Ashley as a girl, and remember that she is very feminine! I am only trying to help her, so please try to help as well." With that being said, Hypno released the Hypnosis, again not realizing how commanding he sounded.

Pikachu blinked confused, as memories were being re-written. He had always been friends with Ashley. Wait... that didn't seem right. Ashley was always his favorite trainer, she had always helped Pikachu grow stronger. Why could Pikachu only remember Ashley as a girl? And with that name? Pikachu stopped worrying about it as the memories finished shifting. Of course Ashley is a girl! She always has been!

Ash, or rather Ashley, on the other hand, was easy to over-write. After all, his memories had already been tampered with, and he was already under the impression that he was a very feminine boy. Now he remembered himself as a she. Her name was Ashley, right? Yes, that sounds right. She had always been a pretty girl, and these clothes belonged solely to her.

'Ashley' got changed into her own clothes and, without any more hassle, left the locker room.

Hypno reflected on what he had seen in the bath. Had Ashley grown some kind of worm on her crotch? Whatever it was, it was definitely not there before. He had seen Ashley bathe before, and he would certainly remember something like that. These things would definitely need to be fixed. He also noticed the lack of bumps on her chest. Ashley hadn't grown too developed, only having around a B-Cup, but somehow she had lost her bumps, and Hypno meant to fix that.

Ashley stopped by the laundry machines to check in on Brock, however he seemed rather busy, so she left to explore the rest of the city.

Where should she go next?
