1311122211112.title: Something Else

choices: Hypno needs to fix something else
1311122211113.content:
Ash and company came back to the locker room to get changed. He wasn't looking forward to putting on his muddy outfit but there wasn't much else he could do, or so he thought. In the hall he was stopped by Marina, the woman that owned the place, who was holding a basket of random items.

“Oh, good. I caught you in time,” Marina smiled.

“Uh, hi. Is something wrong?”

“No, nothing is wrong. I just thought that since it didn't look like you had a spare set of clothes, you might not want to put those muddy things back on. With that in mind, I collected things from our 'lost and found' box. I have been meaning to get around to clearing out the older items anyway.”

“Thank you, that's really nice.”

She handed Ash the box and left him to look for something to get changed into. He wasn't super happy with having to wear someone's forgotten things but it did beat the alternative. Ash placed out the items, on by one onto a bench and looked them over. It looked like the best Marina could come up with was a simple hoodie and black shorts along with a pair of pink socks.

“Wouldn't be my fist choice but here we are. Maybe we should look for a shop and grab something something else to change into once we are done here.”

Quickly, Ash dropped the robe and slipped up the shorts on his now hairless legs, which he finally noticed.

“What?...That's not good...” Ash blinked.

Hypno silently took note of Ashley's displeasure of having to wear shorts with a hint of relief. She had always been a more of a fan of skirts and dresses and it looked like she still remembered that. He was looking forward to helping her find something cute to wear later. Pikachu jumped up on the bench and gave Ash a concerned look. Hypno wondered if Pikachu knew what she used to wear, too. He could tell that Pikachu was really a good pokemon inside but so far things have been a little rough. Ever since Hypno arrived, Pikachu was abrasive if not outright aggressive but it was clear he cared about Ashley. He hoped that Pikachu wasn't normally always so worked up before he was around. Ashley did say he was acting out of character...

“Oh no...I see now,” Hypno thought. “Pikachu must think that since I'm back, I'm going to replace him. He must be so scared.”

Ash looked over the empty bottles from the shower and found the depilatory that Hypno had used on him. Though frustrated at the event, there was no use in being mad at a pokemon that was just doing his best to help. In the end, he decided that there wasn't anything he could about his legs at the moment and he should just move on and grab some pants before his friends saw him. He was sure Misty would have a grand old time at his expense.

The hoodie was next and immediately Ash saw that it was a bit big. Even so, he slipped it on and felt it hang on him in a way he wasn't used to. The front was oddly baggier at the chest and it was so long that it almost covered the shorts completely, which wasn't saying much since the shorts weren't the longest pair out there. After slipping on the pink socks, he looked at himself and felt kind of ridiculous. He grabbed his muddy shoes and slipped them on, dirty as they were, the inside was dry at least. Now finished, he place the the bath items into a collection bin and turned his attention to his muddy things. After considering getting them washed too but chose to just toss them out instead. He reasoned that if he was going to get a new outfit, he wouldn't need to carry that one around anymore. He tossed it out and he, along with his pokemon, left the bathhouse.
1311122211113.title: Something New to Wear

13111222111131.content:
The air on Ash's hairless legs felt odd to him as he made way down the street, his hips gently swaying side to side with every step. Though wearing a hoodie, he still felt exposed due to having so much of those legs showing. It didn't help that he kept getting weird looks from people as he passed them. Their expressions were hard to place and he steadily grew more uncomfortable.

“Do I really look that weird? I feel like I'm I being stared at.”

Ash stopped outside a cafe window and looked at his reflection. He cringed, taking in his appearance, not surprised by how ridiculous he looked but still not pleased. He looked unnervingly feminine, which was really effecting his male ego. He almost looked...cute. Ash's was shaken from his thoughts when he heard a set of familiar voices, much to his annoyance.

“Prepare for trouble!"
"And make it double!”

Ash rolled his eyes and shook his head. “Can you guys wait until later? Now isn't a good time,” Ash turned to face the voices but was surprised to not be their focus. Team Rocket was doing their normal introduction but instead of Ash, they were announcing to a young man and his eevee. Ash jumped behind a car parked along the road and crouched down after realizing who they were talking to. Pikachu and Hypno looked at each other and shrugged before joining Ash behind the car.

“What's Gary doing here?” Ash peaked out from the rear of the car to get a better look. In Gary's arms what a large case of some kind, similar to a cooler chest.

Gary looked just as annoyed as Ash had been, “You guys are still doing this? What do you want?”

“That case looks heavy,” James struck a pose.

“We just want to help lighten your burden,” Jessie mirrored James.

“What? I thought we wanted the Fossils?” Meowth scratched his heads.

The four of them bantered as Ash watched while Hypno tried to make sense for this newest odd behavior. Hypno didn't understand why Ashley was hiding after seeing the guy named Gary but she was staring at him pretty intently.

“I should go over there...but I can't let Gary see me like this,” Ash muttered to himself.

Finally, it dawned on Hypno what was going on. She must really like this guy but was too nervous to know how to act around him. She was clearly self-conscious which, of course, Hypno didn't like seeing. His Ashley was great, anyone could see that, she just needed to see that too. If she wanted Gary to be her boyfriend, then Hypno was going to make sure that would be what happened.
13111222111131.title: Ash spots Gary

choices: Ash takes Gary to a pokecenter
Gary wants to repay Ash for the help.
131112221111311.content:
Jessie pulled out a pokeball and sent out a large snake“If you you won't hand them over...well. Ekans, Get me that case!”

Following Jessie's lead, James sent out a koffing, much to the surprise of Ash. He didn't recall when the last time they they had those kinds of pokemon. He had to assume that they had picked them up for nostalgia's sake once they got to Kanto. He didn't get much time to register the sight as the chaos started.

Ekans lunged forward and made a strike for the case but both Gary and Eevee were ready. With a quick shout from Gary, Eevee dashed forward and tackled at the large snake's face. The strike landed true, knocking the snake to the ground while the koffing closed in. Using the momentum from the first attack, Gary directed Eevee to preform a quick attack, knocking the koffing out of the air.

Ash's guard dropped while watching them battle seeing how well Gary and Eevee handled themselves. Their experience as a battlers was still serving them well, it seemed, not to mention Team Rocket's pokemon were still rookies.

Things made an unfortunate turn, however, as Jessie's ekans wrapped itself around Eevee and glared into his face. The pokemon stiffened, unable to move or act. Koffing followed up forming a smoke screen that obscured the view of the fight from Ash and his pokemon. Not willing to sit out any longer, Ash jumped out and dashed into the smoke. Though difficult to see, they made out the forms of Eevee and Ekans.

“Hypno, use your Psybeam on the Ekans,” Ash cried out.

Hypno planted his feet and reached out his arm, aiming his pendant. Gathering his focus he launched a multicolored beam of energy out and got a lucky on the snake. Gary scrabbled to his knees and picked up his Eevee into his arms. Koffing, seeing the new combatant panicked and released jets of smog around the area. Gary instinctively covered his pokemon and tried to sprint out of the zone, his eyes stinging.

“Koffing, no!” James cried before he and his partners were consumed by smog. He called back his pokemon but the damage was already done. With the battle having turned and a new trainer entering the scene, Team Rocket decided to cut their loses and retreat for the moment.

“Hypno!” Ash called out, getting a lung full of smog. Coughing, he grabbed Hypno and dashed out of the radius of the area as his throat burned.

As the smoke cleared, Ash looked over Hypno, who was luckily okay. Once he was sure his pokemon was fine, he turned his attention to Gary. He was happy to see that they both looked alright. Gray's eevee was already alert, ready to keep fighting.

“It's over buddy. I think we got some help,” he said, squinting over to Ash.

Ash was about to speak but then remembered his state of dress. Suddenly self conscious, Ash froze, not knowing what to say.

“Hey, thanks for the assist. I guess it got a little out of hand there. My name is Gary,” rubbing his eyes Gary walked over to a puzzled Ash.
131112221111311.title: Ash jumps in to help

1311122211113111.content:
Ash was confused at the introduction until he saw Gary having trouble focusing his eyes. He figured that Gary couldn't really see him well, while unfortunate, it did mean that Ash wouldn't have to explain himself.

Ash curtsied on instinct and began to speak but he couldn't get more than a whisper out of his mouth. He tried again but still, nothing came out. He grabbed his neck and made one final attempt before giving up. Gary rubbed his eyes once more and blinked, attempting to clear his vision. Ash pointed at his throat, which Gary was only just barely able to make out threw the blur.

“Oh no, you lost your voice? I'm sorry you got hurt saving our butts. I really appreciate you stepping in when you did. I was transporting some fossils to a former colleague of mine who lives here and if Team Rocket had gotten them, our research project would have gone...up in smoke.”

Gary was pulled from his line of thought by Eevee as he slowly pushed the cooler into Gary's leg. He crouched down and clumsily reached out and scratched his pokemon's head.

“Thanks, little buddy. Not sure what we are going to do now though.”

Ash knew exactly what they were going to do. He bent down and got the attention of his pokemon, pointed at himself and then to the chest. He walked over to the cooler, grabbed a handle and pointed to them before pointing the other end. Pikachu and Hypno understood and stepped over and lifted the other end of the cooler together. Once Eevee saw what was happening, he crouched under the chest and joined the other pokemon in lifting. With the cooler secure, Ash took Gary's hand into his own. Gary smiled as Ash lead them all down the sidewalk.

Together they all walked carefully into the direction of a Pokecenter in hopes that they might be able to help Ash and Gary out. Being the only one able to speak, Gary told Ash about himself. Ash silently chuckled to himself at hearing Gary explain who he was and where he was from. Once he got his voice back, they were going to laugh about this later. Of course, only after he had gotten changed into something less silly looking. It wan't long before, they all arrived at the pokecenter and were greeted by a curious nurse Joy.

“Welcome. How can I help you today?”

“We got into an altercation with a bunch of thieves and a liberal use of smog. All of our pokemon need to be looked over but this trainer and I got it pretty bad too,” Gary explained, unable to figure out where she was exactly.

“Oh dear. That's horrible but don't worry, you are all in good hands. Can I get your names and what your symptoms are?”

“I'm Gary Oak and I'm having trouble seeing but I don't know their name. Looks like the smog messed with their vocal chords.”

Nurse Joy frowned hearing what happened and instructed the group to take a seat. They all sat down and waited for Nurse Joy to get everything ready.
“Hey, so, I don't know how long this is going to take and I'm sure you are busy but I'd really like it if you'd let me thank you. Would you be interested in joining me for dinner tonight?” Gary asked with a hint of nervousness.

Ash, never one to turn down food, nodded. Once he was sure Ash said yes, he told him the place and time just as Nurse Joy came round with a wheel chair. Gary and Eevee said goodbye before being taken away. It was a short wait before she came back for the rest of them and were taken to another room.

After a short examination, Joy was able to confirm that Hypno and Pikachu were both fine. Unfortunately for Ash, his vocal chords were swollen and inflamed. Nurse Joy opened a cabinet and pulled out a pink bottle as well as a small paper cup. She poured the contents into the cup and instructed Ash to drink it, which he did after sniffing the cup.

The relief was immediate but his voice was still gone. She assured him that his voice would not only be back sooner than later, he would also be pleasantly surprised with the sound. Ash didn't pay that last bit any mind since he didn't really care how he sounds but was happy with how the medicine soothed his throat. As they finished up, she wrote him a script and told him that he could pick up a bottle at the Celadon Department Store. Ash gaver her the softist of squeks of thanks before leaving with a destination in mind. Not only were they going to get the medicine, the department store sounded like a great place to pick up something else to wear.
1311122211113111.title: Ash takes Gary to a pokecenter

choices: They go to a clothing store
13111222111131111.content:
Though it wasn't the first time he had ever seen the Celadon Department Store, Ash was still taken aback by the size of the place. The building reached into the clouds, the windows shining with the reflected sun, stunning Ash for just a moment. A moment was all it took to keep Ash's thoughts occupied while he was approached by a sales girl holding a bottle up to him.

“Would you like to try a free sample?” she chirped with a big smile.

Ash turned with a soft “hmm?” that the girl took as a sound of acceptance rather than of questioning. In a flash, Ash was surrounded by a cloud of purple smoke. The mist forced its way up his nose and into his lungs, burning as it did so. In between coughs he tried to ask what she just sprayed him with.

“I'm happy you asked! This brand new perfume was made with love in our hearts and on our mind at the Celadon Gym! Though we believe all of our perfumes are special, this one is especially so. Its a secret blend of fragrance with a base of wormadam flower essence imported from the Sinnoh region. Wormadam is unique in that it is the only plant based pokemon that naturally learns 'Attract' as it grows and with that in mind we set forth on making a perfume that would do just-” She was cut off by Ash who squeaked out a “no thanks” as he made his way to the elevator. Thanks to the spray, his head was feeling a little odd. He hopped that getting away from the area would help him feel less strange.
“If you change your mind, you can buy a bottle at the Celadon Gym!” she waved as he and his pokemon disappeared behind closing elevator doors.

“We just got a... bath. What...what happened,” Ash clutched his throat.

After speaking a few more phrases to himself and doing his best to return his voice back to it's proper octave, he found himself unable to make himself sound any deeper. It had been such a strange day and it seemed like it was only getting weirder as it went on.

The doors to the elevator

Hypno smiled hearing the voice that came out of Ashley's mouth. It sounded different than he remembered but still very pretty, not to mention much prettier than the one she was speaking with before. As the doors opened into the pharmacy level, Hypno made a mental note to help remind her to keep taking it, so she doesn't forget.

Shelves segmented the pharmacy into multiple sections, each with numerous health items from humans and pokemon, alike. Ash assumed that the place probably smelled like antiseptic but for the moment, all he could smell was the flowery remains of that spray from downstairs. As they entered, they were greeted by a man at a counter as they entered. The team stepped over where Ash curtsied and introduced himself.

“I really need to talk to her about using that nickname,” Hypno thought.

With a breathy voice, Ash explained what he needed and handed over the script. After a short look around, the pharmacy tech came back with a bottle that looked the same as the one Nurse Joy had. It was when he told them how much it was did Ash realize the problem. He opened his wallet and counted what he had but it wasn't enough to cover the price of the bottle.

“Sorry, I can't afford that. I guess I should go,” Ash said turning to leave.

Hypno was distraught at hearing that they were just going to leave. His Ashley needed her medicine and this human had to understand. With all his might, Hypno climbed up onto the counter, much to the surprise of the pharmacy tech. Once again, Hypno used his hypnosis and put the unsuspecting man into a trance.

“Please, Ashley needs her medicine. She can pay you back later. Right now, she needs your help to be healthy,” Hypno informed him.

“Ashley needs her medicine. She can pay me back. Right now she needs my help to be healthy,” the man repeated back before walking away from the register.

“Ashley? Hypno...stop this!” Ash was shocked to see what his pokemon was doing.

He moved forward to stop Hypno but the pokemon turned the hypnotism back onto him. Ash froze in place, falling back into a trance once more.

“It's okay, I'm just helping.”

“It's okay. You are just helping.”

Hypno was just about to talk about the name situation when is spotted a yellow blur. Pikachu slammed into Hypno, knocking him to the ground. He didn't have time to react before he was slapped by a tail whip, which caused Hypno to spin. Pikachu kept up the assault with a thunder shock and Hypno recoiled from the attack. Hypno knew he couldn't beat pikachu in a battle, he was just too strong. The best he could hope for was to talk reason into him. With everything he had, Hypno held up his arm and moved his pendant. Though he tried to shrug it off, he was soon entranced like everyone else. Hypno took deep breaths until he was finally able to communicate.

“Pikachu...I'm not your enemy...I'm not trying to replace you. Ashley is my trainer as well as yours. She won't abandon you now that I'm back. Please, stop fighting me. I'm just helping our trainer.”

It took Pikachu a few moments to process what he had been told. Once Hypno was sure he wasn't going to get attacked again, he turned his attention back to his trainer.

“I know things haven't been normal but just trust me. You should stop going by Ash and start going by Ashley again.”

“Things haven't been normal. I should trust you. I should stop going by Ash. I should....I should go by...,” Ash's mind fought the new command but Hypno wasn't going to give up.

“It's okay. Your name is Ashley, not Ash,” he pressed.

“My name...My name is...My name is Ashley,” Ashley said, his resistance braking.

“Good. I'm so glad you remember! Now, once we get your medicine, don't forget to take it like you are supposed to. Once we do that we can get you something cute to change into for your date with Gary tonight.”

Ashley's mind swirled, trying to take in that last command. The words tumbled around and around until the pharmacy tech returned, jostling him from the trance. He was handed the bottle he came fore but also several items from around the shop. There were several supplements, all for women to promote a healthy body. Ashley read the instructions and removed one dose of everything. He asked the tech for some water and he was all too happy to help. Once he returned with a bottle of water, he handed it over while Ashley stared at his handful of pills that very much not meant for a guy. His pulse raced as he stood there, thinking about what he was about to do. He knew he shouldn't...that they were going to do weird things to him...In a swift movement, he tossed them into his mouth and chased them with the water.

“Come on guys. Let go get me something...something to get changed into for my...for my...for tonight,” Ashley said, still fighting the last commands.
13111222111131111.title: Ash goes to the Pharmacy

131112221111311111.content:
The elevator's aggressively inoffensive music played as Ashley's head throbbed. He looked down at his bag of items, brow furrowed in confusion. He couldn't understand why he had taken the pills when it was so obvious that they were meant for women. He was a guy, it didn't make any sense at all.

Pikachu was in a haze of his own after being subject to Hypno's ability. He was doing his best to shake it off but wasn't having an easy time of it. Everything in him was telling him that something was wrong, that Hypno was dangerous. Hypno wasn't his enemy but he was still causing Ash to act weird, even if he was only tying to help her. He glowered at the oblivious Pokemon, trying to summon the will to jolt him but he just couldn't bring himself to fight him anymore.

Hypno bounced with joy at how well everything was going since they got to town. His Ashley was remembering herself and her new pikachu was finally settling down since he had the heart to heart with him earlier. He knew it would take time but he hoped they could become friends soon. There was so much to learn about battling from such a strong pokemon.

The elevator doors opened once they got to their floor reveling store after store. They walked together, new clothes on their agenda. Much to Hypno's dismay, Ashley kept going to stores that normally held his preferred but every time he picked something up, it just didn't feel right. They just weren't...cute. Ashley was getting really frustrated at his own thoughts, forcefully handing the plain t-shirt back on the rack.

“Sorry guys, this was a bust. It doesn't look like we are going to find anyth-” Ashley cut himself off in mid thought, pausing as they exited the last clothing store when he spotted something that caught his eye.

In the window of another shop was an a simple blue dress hanging loosely over a mannequin. Ashley couldn't understand what it was about it that held is interest like it was but he had a hard time pulling his eyes away from it. Taking a few steps backwards he looked up to read the name of the store.

“Nora's” is said in stylized purple letters. It was the place the rude lady told him to go to back at the bath house, he remembered. From the look of it, it was a woman's store, which wasn't something Ashley had any interest in visiting. Even so, his eyes drifted back to the dress. Hypno took Ashely's hand and began tugging it, attempting to lead him inside.

“It wouldn't hurt to just look,” Ash relented though uncomfortable.

A bell chimed, announcing the entrance of the trio, which alerted Nora to their arrival. Nora's voice projected out from the back of the store, informing them that she would be with them momentarily. Hypno wasted no time in pulling Ashley over to a rack of skirts he thought might be to taste while Ashley took in the sight of various shoes lining the left wall and undergarments lining the right. He felt uneasy surrounded by so many feminine garments and started to consider leaving.

“I'm so glad you came, Ash was it?” Nora grinned, stepping out from the back room.

“Ashley...”

“Oh, yes. Ashley. I remember now,” she lied.

“Um...I'm not really sure-” Ashley began to explain why he had to leave but was interrupted.

“What to get? Don't worry, I have an eye for this kind of thing. Come along,” She said taking his arm into her own.

Ashley couldn't get a word in edgewise as Nora lead him to a chair and had him take off his shoes. She sized his feet then pulled out a tiny notebook and made a note of it. She then stood him up and very quickly produced measuring tap and got his sizes. She pulled him over to the wall of undergarments, which was making Ashley feel uneasy. She grabbed a matching pair of panties and a bra, both with a small bit of lace.

“The bra should help, I think you will be pleasantly surprised.”

“Help with wh-” Ashley was interrupted buy another tug of his arm.

His pokemon followed as he was yanked back and forth across the shop while Nora held different articles of clothing up to Ashley's body. His face grew flush with embarrassment at everything that was happening and tried to bring this experience to an end.

“Hey, I don't think-”

“Your right, green isn't your color.”

“No I can't wear-”

“You're right, we should show off your legs.”

“Look, I just looking for something to wear tonight.”

“What's happening tonight?”

“I have a da...dinner. I'm going to dinner.”

“Dinner, huh? With a boy?” She smirked.

“Well, yes...but.”

“Oh, I know just the thing!”

Ashley's arms were filled with a slow growing pile of women's clothes which soon became too high for him to see passed. He was lead into a large changing room, stumbling along as he blindly followed. Everything was taken out of his hands and placed on a bench inside.

“You start getting changed into one of the selections and I'll get you some shoes to try. We will find you something perfect for tonight, I promise,” Nora said, closing the door as she left the trio along with the clothes.
131112221111311111.title: They go to a clothing store

choices: A lace crop top and flowing floral skirt
1311122211113111113.content:
Ash just wanted to get it over with went through the options he had been given and after a few minutes decided on the

1311122211113111113.title: Something Else

13111222111131111132.content:
Ash stripped down and picked an outfit and was gonna put it on when Hypno stopped him pointing at the bra & panties “but” was all Ash could get out as he hypnotized him into putting them on however before he did he sent Hypno out of the booth then started trying several outfits before deciding on a pink & black dress

When Nora returned Hypno hypnotized here into giving Ashley a few more outfits before she handed him a pair of skin collared tights and stroppy sandals Ash came out a moment later with Hypno carrying a few items

Nora then lead them over to the in house Salon where Ash got her nails done, slight makeup & hair extensions once done Ash saw himself and started to freak but Hypno calmed him, Nora told her how beautiful she looked and that her date was a kucky guy

Nora then handed Ash a purse as thanked her for help then left for the Pokecenter where they run into...
13111222111131111132.title: Black & Pink dress

choices: Have a nice dinner then went to
131112221111311111321.content:
As the trio approached the PokeCenter they saw Gary waiting outside now wearing a suit with sunglasses, when he saw them he waved as he said “Hey Ashley, are you ready or am I to early?”

“Hey Gary” Ashley got a weird look on her face coughed then continued “you look great just give me a moment I need to put this stuff away and leave these two with Nurse Joy. Then we can go” Ash said before coughing again

What Ash didn’t know is that aside from the medication he needed for his throat the pharmacist gave pills that altered his voice and some estrogen and they had slow been working. Ash went up to the room dropped off his packages while in the room Hypno got Ash’s attention

“Remember to use your manners, be polite and don’t forget to give a kiss good night...if you had a good time” Hypno said after hypnotizing Ash again

Ash then went downstairs dropped Pikachu and Hypno off with Nurse Joy asking her to look after the and she would pick them up later then headed out

“Hi Gary sorrry about that but I’m ready now”
131112221111311111321.title: Gary

choices: Hypno gets his trainer back through unethical manners
132.content:
Hypno stopped for a second, perhaps it was a different person, still they probably can help.

Using some of his leftover energy he comes closer...

That confirmed his fear, it was not Ashley, instead a spiky hair person who was referred as "Ash".

The frustration grew but he stepped closer, perhaps there was something he could do to get his Ashley, he smirked deviantly as he revealed.
132.title: Hypno has doubts that Ash is his trainer.

choices: Next thing Dan knows, he is back home.
14.content:
It was a brisk October evening but the theater was warm. Daniel sat uncomfortably in his seat next to his friend Scott. They were about to watch some hypnotist show or something and Dan was dreading it. He hated this cheesy kind of thing, people pretending that they were being mind-controlled into acting like idiots. Normally he wouldn't have even come to something like this but he knew it would cheer up Scott.

Scott was his roommate and at one point he would even say friend. Not now. Not anymore. Scott didn't know, but Daniel and Scott's girlfriend, Mandy had been spending a lot of time together and at some point, things turned intimate. It went on like that for a time until the stress of the affair became too much for Mandy and she ended up ending the relationship with Scott. It had been a few weeks and Scott was still heartbroken. Dan felt guilty for what he had done but he knew that no good would come of telling Scott about it. The best he could do for Scott was to hide the fact that his friend betrayed him, or so Dan thought. Dan just wished he could do something to fix things. He would do anything to help Scott get over Mandy and make things right.

That's why Dan got him and Scott tickets to the hypnotist show. Though Dan hated this stuff, Scott loved all that pseudoscience crap. It wasn't much but he could do this much for Scott, thought Daniel.

Suddenly the lights dimmed and a spotlight hit the opening curtain, revealing an odd-looking man dressed in black. He had way too much eye makeup on and his bald head gleamed in the shining light.

The man spoke with a solemn tone, "Welcome ladies and gentlemen. I am Drake Bloodstone.”

Dan sighed as Drake continued, “Tonight we are all explorers. Not explorers of strange jungles or dark tombs but of something much more frightening: the human mind."

"Pffft," escaped Daniel's mouth much to Drake's obvious distaste. Dan didn't realize he had even done it until Scott nudged him.

Dan gave Scott a sheepish, "Sorry."

Bloodstone cleared his throat and then continued. "There is still much to be discovered about the mind and tonight we will plunge deep into the unknown, past the veil of consciousness into eternity."

Daniel rolled his eyes as Drake continued, "To start, I will need a volunteer."

One by one, the stage filled with people from the audience. There were the normal things: people singing, people pretending to be animals, and other mildly embarrassing actions but all and all nothing special.

“Tonight we have journeyed and adventured but our time together is over,” Drake said with open arms.

“Finally,” Dan said quietly. Apparently not quietly enough because Drake looked right at Dan.

“Perhaps, we have time for one more pilgrimage. You sir, please come up here.” The next thing Daniel knew, he was standing on stage.
14.title: Stage Show

choices: Dan wakes in an embarrassing position
Dan wakes in the car on their way home.
141.content:
Dan didn't even realize he had left his seat before Drake began to question him.

“Please, tell me your name.” Bloodstone said. When he looked at Dan, his gaze pierced him and made him feel cold. There was something about this guy that made him really uncomfortable.

“Dan,” answered. Bloodstone just looked at him but it felt more like he was looking into him. Then he smiled, as if he had just found something he was looking for.

Drake turned to the audience as he asked him another question.“Thank you, Dan. Now tell me, why are you here tonight?”

“I wanted to treat my friend Scott. He enjoys this kind of stuff,” Daniel explained.

“Scott, where are you?” Drake asked with a grand gesture but Dan got the feeling he knew which audience member he was looking for.

Scott raised his hand and Bloodstone gestured for him to come up on stage as well.

“Hello Scott, welcome.” Bloodstone greeted Scott with a handshake.

“Thank you, sir. I'm a fan of your work.” Drake smiled but Dan felt confused. Scott never once mentioned that he knew about this Bloodstone guy before.

“Well thank you, I'm happy to hear that. Now lets get started,” With that, Drake was looking right into Dan again. In a flash everything went black for Dan.
141.title: Join the Show

choices: Once home, Dan starts acting a bit oddly
1411.content:
It was like waking up. He was disoriented at first but Dan quickly put his senses back in order, the first sense to come back being smell. It was a familiar musk but Dan couldn't quite place it, all he knew was that it smelled really good. So much so, that he shivered a little bit. Next his hearing returned, which started off as a distant muted thing that grew and swallowed him up. Eventually it cleared into what Dan could only describe as laughter. It was then that he realized that he was sitting on something. His hand was absently rubbing against something while he felt his leg bouncing up and down. That's when he opened his eyes.

He found his vision a bit obscured as it seemed that his face was nuzzling up close to something slightly rough but warm. Pulling back and looking down, Dan saw his legs. His baggy pants had been folded up to his mid thigh and his legs were crossed at the knee with one of them going up and down in an idle bounce. His dress shirt was undone and tied into a small knot leaving his stomach exposed. Dan could feel the fingers of his right hand twirling his brown hair that was coming down past his shoulder. He lifted his hand and felt the ponytail, higher and tighter on his head then he tied it before Him and Scott left.

Dan stiffened when he realized why the musky smell was so familiar, it was Scott's cologne. Dan withdrew his other hand, the one that had sneaked under Scott's shirt rubbing his chest leaped off of Scott's lap. His face was hard to read but Dan could see embarrassment as Scott quickly put his hand in his lap.

“Give them a hand,” Drake said to the audience while gesturing to Dan and Scott. The audience exploded with applause as Drake motioned for Dan to take a seat, which he did as fast has he could. Before Scott could leave, Drake leaned in and whispered something into his ear. Trying to get to his seat, people kept telling Dan how funny he was and how good of a performance he delivered to which Dan could only give a weak “thanks”. Once Scott was seated Bloodstone simply said, “Thank you everyone and goodnight.” and then withdrew behind the stage curtain.

As Dan gathered his coat Scott look over at him and told him, “You know, its going to be cold outside.” Dan looked down a realized, to his embarrassment, he didn't fix his attire.
1411.title: Dan wakes in an embarrassing position

choices: The next morning, Dan noticed what we wore the previous night.
14111.content:
After Dan fixed his clothes back up they left the theater. The ride home was very quite, Dan not knowing what to say. There were so many questions that he wanted to ask but he just could bring himself to vocalize them. Did he really want to know what he did on stage to get such a big reaction out of the audience? Was hypnosis real? He always thought it was just something to part stupid people with their money. Maybe it was better not to know and just try and forget any of this happened. Still, he was left troubled.

He hardly noticed when they arrived back to their apartment, his head still feeling a little off. Scott plopped down on the couch and turned on the TV while Dan started to get ready for bed. After changing into his night shirt and pajama pants, Dan walked into the kitchen to fix himself something to eat. He grabbed a beer and made a simple ham and cheese sandwich. When he sat down to eat it, he just didn't feel hungry anymore. Thinking that maybe he was getting sick or something, he got up to put the food back into the fridge but found himself walking up to Scott and handing him the sandwich and the beer. Scott looked Dan up and down with a slight confused expression.

“I decided I wasn't hungry,” Dan said as Scott took the food.

“Thanks,” Scott said as Dan turned away to go to bed, wearing one of Mandy's left over camisoles and her pink pajama bottoms.
14111.title: Once home, Dan starts acting a bit oddly

choices: Scott explains to Dan what happened last night...
Dan doesn't have time for this; he's heading to the gym...
1413.content:
Dan woke up the next morning to the sound of his alarm, but he couldn't seem to remember anything after being called up on stage. Had he started drinking or something? If so, he didn't remember it, but he presumed he had drank quite a lot if he forgot even starting. He looked at the clock; it said 7AM. He was already running late. He wanted to hit up the gym before work.

It got even stranger as he rummaged through his clothing to find something to wear. His entire wardrobe seemed to be filled with clothes that didn't belong to him. Luckily he found something tucked away in the bottom that would work. He walked passed Scott eating a bowl of cereal in their shared kitchen. Dan had joined him plenty of times in the past, but he just didn't have the time today.

However, when Scott saw Dan, he nearly spit out a mouthful of milk.

"What the heck are you wearing? Why are you wearing Mandy's yoga pants? And her sports bra?" Scott asked.

"Because I couldn't find anything of mine." Dan said matter of factly, then his tone changed accusingly, "It's like SOMEONE is playing a prank on me."

"I didn't touch anything! And even if I did, how bad could your clothes be that you'd choose to wear...that!"

"Because everything else in there is for a guy!"

Scott's eyes suddenly went wide, "You're STILL under the hypnosis from last night?"

"What?"
1413.title: Dan wakes up the next morning

14131.content:
"So, last night, that Bloodstone guy hypnotized you into thinking that you were a woman." Scott explained.

"That's ridiculous. I AM a woman. He wouldn't need to hypnotize me to convince me of that!" Dan protested.

Scott didn't know where to begin, "Look at your chest! It's flat!"

Dan began to tear up, "I know they're small, but you don't have to be mean!"

"No, I mean..." Scott was struggling to explain, "Look at your pants! I mean, that thing is bulging out from those yoga pants! Don't you see it!"

"Stop looking at my crotch, Scott! There's nothing bulging there! And you have a girlfriend!"

"You have a crew cut!"

Dan teared up again, "The salon made the pixie cut a little too short; you don't need to keep reminding me!"

"What's your name?"

"Dan."

"Does that sound like a woman's name?"

"It's short for Danielle."

Scott was really struggling to explain this to Dan.
14131.title: Scott explains to Dan what happened last night...

141312.content:
"Whatever." Scott finally rolled his eyes and gave up, figuring Dan would snap out of it eventually.

Despite his appearance, Dan's visit to the gym was largely uneventful. A few people were definitely staring at him, but no one said anything. Dan interpreted the looks as people checking him out; he thought the visits to the gym were really working out.

After working out, Dan entered the women's locker room. It was early enough that the locker room was rather empty. The few women present just figured Dan was gay or trans and didn't make a big deal of his presence there.

After showering and wrapping himself in a towel, Dan realized he didn't have any clothes to change into. He didn't want to put back his sweaty workout clothes. And even if he did, he'd return home to all that guy's clothing in his closet that someone was pranking him with. His first target was the lost and found, but everything in there stank of sweat as well. With the locker room still fairly empty, he decided to instead peek into some unlocked lockers. He felt a little guilty, but he told himself he'd only take something if someone seemed to have two of something in there.

It didn't result in the most flattering outfit, but he could make it work. When Dan looked in the mirror, he saw a beautiful woman in a white t-shirt, black leather skirt, and red heels. When anyone else looked at Dan, they saw an awkward guy stuffing himself into drag that looked too small. With a bit of stolen makeup, he finished the job and headed out of the gym.
141312.title: Scott gives up

1413122.content:
Dan couldn't help but feel a little self-conscious about what Scott had said to him earlier. His short hair and his small chest both bothered him. His missing wardrobe did as well. A small shopping trip could work as a stop-gap for some clothes until his could be found. A call to the hair salon guaranteed him an appointment for a weave later in the day.

Then there was the matter of his chest. Dan found himself considering implants. He made a few more phone calls. He couldn't imagine why so many doctors seemed so hesitant. He didn't think he was asking for anything too crazy, just an extra cup size or two. Finally, he found someone willing to give him a consultation just a little after his hair appointment. If all went well with that, he might have the surgery by the end of the week.

Dan had no idea what he was actually doing to himself.
1413122.title: Dan goes back home

choices: Scott lets Dan tell him more details
14131222.content:
Several days had passed and Scott couldn't recall the last time he had seen Dan around. He hadn't thought too much about his lingering hypnotic state either, just figuring it would wear off soon. It wasn't until a week later when Scott sat down for breakfast again. He heard some noises coming from the front door, a jingling of keys, and then in walked a woman in a red dress that Scott had never seen before.

It took Scott a minute to realize that it wasn't a woman at all; it was Dan! He had long hair now, slightly smeared makeup on his face, red high heels and a matching purse. His legs were shaved. Scott noticed that the red dress was cut low; it looked like Dan had real breasts...real LARGE breasts. Scott was a little baffled.

"Sorry, I had a late night." Dan muttered.

"What have you done to yourself?" Scott asked.

"I know, I know. I've always been such a quiet girl. But I thought about what you said the other week. I thought I could sex it up a little bit."

"Did you get breast implants!?"

"I know. It seems a little extreme, but I do feel so much more confident when I go out. And they worked. I had a VERY good night with Michael last night."

"Michael? Our friend Michael? The gay one?"

"Oh, honey, he's not gay. Trust me; we went ALL the way. I made a man out of him."

Scott looked at Dan, noting that he could still see a slight bulge in the front of the dress. That hypnosis was very strong, and for some reason Dan thought he was a woman and didn't realize he had a penis. Scott sighed. There was no way he'd be able to convince his friend about his true gender it seemed.
14131222.title: After the hair appointment...

choices: "Hey Danny, clean up around here. Okay, Danny?"
"Hey Danny, box up all of your things. Okay, Danny?"
143.content:
Dan rolled over, waking up from a deep and restful sleep. He stretched, yawned and sat up. He performed his normal morning rituals and was brushing his teeth when it hit him. He didn't remember coming home last night. That thought frightened him. He ran the events in his head several times but each time it ended with him being called on stage.

Dan finished in the bathroom, got dressed and went looking for Scott. Scott was in the kitchen eating breakfast when Dan stepped in.

“Hey, uh...odd question. What happened last night?”

Scott didn't look at Dan, “A bunch of things.”

Scott's tone gave Dan pause. It was cold and had an edge to it.

“Are you ok?” Dan said, finding his voice.

He wasn't ok, that was obvious by the look on Scott's face when he met Dan's eyes.

Dan sputtered, “I...uh, I don't know why you are upset but I hope I'd didn't cause it. I don't really remember much of last night.”

Scott studied Dan and then laughed a bitter laugh. Dan didn't know how to respond to that. He was really feeling uncomfortable standing in the kitchen during the silence after that laugh.

Scott took a breath, “Hey Danny, Don't worry about last night. Okay, Danny?”

Dan didn't know why he would be worrying about last night. At that moment, he was more concerned with how Scott was acting. Without another word, Scott finished his breakfast and put his dishes in the sink. He cleaned his face and went to leave for work. Just before he left he paused thinking about something. Coming to some kind of conclusion he turned back to Dan and said...
143.title: Next thing Dan knows, he is back home.

1431.content:
Dan glanced around the room, eyes wide as he took in just how messy things had gotten. “Dang, yeah, I’ll handle that. This place really is a mess.” He immediately went to work on the sink, taking the dishes and beginning to scrub.

Behind him, Scott let out a low, appreciative whistle. Bloodstone really had done a number on him...a number on the guy he’d thought was his best friend, only to find out he’d been the one his girlfriend had cheated on him for.

But did Dan actually cheat, or did Bloodstone simply hypnotize him to say he did?
1431.title: Cleaning

choices: “...throw all of this away. Okay, Danny?”
“...take all of this and leave. Okay, Danny?”
1432.content:
“Wait, what?” Dan asked, eyes wide.

“Hey Danny, don’t worry about it and just do it. Okay, Danny?”

Upon Scott finishing his statement, Dan nodded, immediately feeling at ease. He didn’t know what he’d felt so worked up about. Scott probably just needed to move his furniture or something. Grabbing a box, Dan began to walk around the house, gathering anything that was his and setting it inside the box. Upon finishing, he had three boxes he set down on Scott’s table.

“What do you want me to do with them?” He asked, not at all concerned.

Scott and Dan have always been friends. However, Scott has always felt a rivalry with Dan; whatever he did, Dan always seemed to be better. Last night, to hear that Dan had come because he pitied Scott and thought that he might break over the break-up had pushed Scott over the edge; he was not fragile, and he could be just as good as Dan. In fact, if he took Dan out of the picture, he’d be considered one of the best.

And then he was given a way to on a silver platter because now he could make Dan do, think, feel however he wanted.

“Hey Danny...”
1432.title: "Hey Danny, box up all of your things. Okay...

choices: Scott returns later with more instuctions
14321.content:
“Hey Danny, throw all of this away. Okay, Danny?”

Dan was followed by Scott out the door, his boxes in hand. One by one, he dumped them into the trash as Scott coldly watched on. Once his hands were empty, he just stood there looking at his possessions.

Scott spoke up again, “Hey Danny, give me your phone, Okay Danny?”

Without questioning it, he handed over his cell and was again dumbfounded. Something was going on but he couldn't quite figure out what it was. All he knew was that something was wrong.

“Hey Danny, you are going to go back inside and clean the house until I get back, Okay Danny?”

Scott watched Dan head back inside before getting into his car and driving off. Once inside, Dan imminently got to work putting the house in order. He never really considered himself unclean but suddenly everything around him looked like it was out of sorts and needed attention. He sorted the items on the coffee table, tossed any of Scott's clothes into his hamper and began cleaning the surfaces. It all kind of ended blending together.

The one moment that stuck out to him though was while he cleaned the dishes. He was scrubbing a particularly stubborn pan when he heard the sound of the trash collectors pull up. He watched them take his things and carelessly toss them into the back of the trash truck. That moment hammered home the fact that all he had let were the items in his pocket and the clothes on his back.

“What am I going to do?” he wondered before giving his full attention back to the pan.

She owned the property, and leased you the second floor to all to yourself

Things were going to turn out just fine.

15212121121111122121.content:
Troy found Mrs. Stevens on the porch looking at an old photo album when he came back to the apartment. She didn't look up at him as he approached.

“Hi, Mrs. Stevens,” he said trying to figure out an opening to talk about this.

“Hm,” she said a little coldly.

That was new, he thought. She was always very talkative when he got home.

“Are you alright,” he said a little concerned.

“I spoke to Joseph Campbell today,” she said not looking at him.

His heart started to race as he began to panic. It was only now that he thought about what he had done. He had gone in, clearly a man, and the woman in the main lobby must have told Mr. Campbell. Mr. Campbell must have told her a man came to interview and not a woman. She must have put it all together and figured it out. He was going to be homeless.

“I'm sorry, Mrs. Stevens, I'm really sorry. I didn't know what to do! Everything was happening so fast and you have been so nice but I...I...” Troy found himself starting to sob. He was too upset to continue his apologies for misleading her hugging his chest.

Troy didn't know the woman could move as fast as she did as she quickly came over and hugged him.

“Shush, Tory. I'm sorry, too. You are a sweet girl,” she said rubbing his back.

“Wait?” he said now confused.

“I was upset when I found out that you didn't go to the interview. I thought you had blown it off and it hurt thinking you would do something like that to me. I should have been more considerate of your feelings. I didn't know you were having so much anxiety about everything,” She said and hugged Troy a little harder.

Troy was confused and felt awful. He had been taking advantage of this woman and all she had done was show him kindness and understanding. He couldn't stop sobbing over how horrible he felt.

"I'll set up another interview, ok? I'll make something up for why you couldn't make it. It will be ok, dear," She said.

Troy couldn't argue. Not today.

Over the next week, Troy was a bundle of nerves. At work he kept replaying the events that lead up to his current predicament while he clicked away on his computer. He was actually going to be a bridesmaid for a friend. That was never something he ever though would happen, nor every wanted for that matter. He nearly jumped when Mr. Smith said his "name."

"Tory, I need you in my office when you have a moment," spoke the voice from the intercom.

"I'll be right there Mr. Smith," Troy chipped.

Troy sent off an email and walked into his bosses office. He sat across from him and crossed his legs in a feminine way that was no longer practiced but natural. Mr. Smith made an effort to look at Troy's face and not his legs.

"Tory, are you happy here?" he asked flatly.

"Well, yes Mr. Smith," Tory replied. He suddenly felt afraid that his job in jeopardy. He was so happy here, it would be devastating to have to leave...before he was ready, of course. He had to remind himself that he wasn't staying long term just until he could move out.

"You can call me Joe if I'm not with a client, Tory," he said with a smile.

"Okay...Joe," Troy said, now a little confused.

"I'm glad to hear that you like it here. Your performance has been exceptional. I have to say, you are the best secretary I've had," he said.

"Oh, thank you," Troy said with his own smile.

"I don't want to risk you finding work elsewhere, so I've pulled some strings," Joseph pushed a paper across his desk which Troy picked up.

"I...I don't know what to say," Troy said looking at what was written. He was getting a raise and it was substantial. He was beside himself.

"You don't have to say anything. You have earned it," Joe said, pleased with Troy's reaction.

"Thank you, Joe," Troy beamed.

Joseph lead Troy out of his office and closed the door leaving Troy with what had just happened. This was exciting! He had to tell his friends...

robin sits down and the lady immediately starts washing his hair making small talk as she does.

He totally forgot that he'd never mentioned what he wanted done with it,

A woman took his hands and began cleaning his nails, Robin realized John must've ordered him more than just a haircut... that's alright, he can handle some nail polish or whatever they end up doing to him, nothing they do he can't undo.

One woman washed and started drying his hair, while the other began with the nail Polish... of course it was pink in color, what other color would it be.

While he had his eyes closed he felt some clipping near his face, he opened his eyes in alarm, a third woman had been trimming and plucking his eyesbrows, she'd already done some damage to one eyebrow... he couldn't much stop her now could he.

A few minutes later into the haircut, again his eyes were closed when he felt something cold touch his face...

Oh shit, one was smearing a cream colored makeup stuff on his face. Next she applied some lipstick along with some other makeups, she finished while the other woman started on his toe-nails.

A little later the woman finished with his hair... Oh No... he hadn't anticipated that, she'd given him bangs, and layers, his hair looked really girly... that wouldn't be easy to undo.

The other woman wrapped on his toenails, letting them dry before finishing and helping put his shoes back on.

Robin returns to john blushing with embarrassment.

1532111121211222111121111.content:
Oh, come on, our one month anniversary? Robin was frustrated and upset. Everything was getting out of control. John lead him to the car by the waist and quickly jumped in before John could do something weird. John got in on the other side and placed his hand on Robin's leg. Robin pushed it off and saw the confusion on Johns face. Robin thought for a second and scratched his leg.

“Sorry, I...uh...haven't shaved my legs in a while, they are kind of itchy...” Robin said looking for any reason not to be touched.

“That's fine. You can shave once we get back. We are going to need to get changed anyway,” he said while reaching into the back seat of the car.

“Changed?” Robin asked afraid of the answer.

“For our date tonight, I've set up something fancy for us,” head said grabbing a bag.

“Oh, I can't go out tonight...I don't have shoes to match my dress,” again Robin said looking for anything.

In silence, John places a bag in Robin's lap. In the bag was a shoe box and Robin knew what was coming next...in the box was a pair of heels that would match the dress.

“Well?” John was getting worried that he hadn't gotten something nice enough.

“They are beautiful,” Robin whispered.

He looked over and saw John leaning in and Robin waited as John kissed him again. Luckily it was a light one and they started to drive back home.

Once home, Robin didn't have any choices left. He took off all his clothes and grabbed a razor. He lathered up his legs and shaved off his leg hair. Once that was done, he put the underwear and the body shaper on followed by the dress. Once it was all in place, he stepped into the high heels. He saw the pretty girl in the mirror and she looked like she wanted to cry.

John was equally well dressed and offered his arm to Robin. Robin begrudgingly took the arm and they left to have a fancy dinner.
1532111121211222111121111.title: John has plans for a Fancy dinner

15321111212112221111211112.content:
Robin was distraught at the whole idea. He didn't want this at all but he didn't know how to get out of it.

"Robyn, are you okay? You look a little pale," John asked concerned.

Robin didn't need to say anything. Before he could even get to the car, he got sick all over himself. Robin didn't even know it was going to happen until it did. They were both surprised at this. Robin leaned over and John hovered not knowing what to do. After a moment, John took Robin back inside.

"John..." Robin was about to just spill the beans on the whole thing.

"Hey, it's okay, don't worry," John said rubbing his back.

Robin quickly got a shower and was surprisingly happy. He just dodged a bullet and if he played his cards right, he could avoid more embarrassment by pretending he is really sick.
15321111212112221111211112.title: Getting sick

153211112121122211112111121.content:
After hopping out of the shower he looked at his reflection, his new bangs hung wet on his forhead, and the new color was a bit jolting, he also realized he hadn't washed any of the makeup off before showering, and it was obvious most of it hadn't completely washed off, instead just running and creating streaks down his face.

Robin spent a few moments trying to wash it off his face, finding it more difficult than expected but managed to get it off mostly, still a bit of smeared eyeshadow and the lipstick stayed on completely unfazed.

He layed down in bed, and to Johns Credit he was sooo SOO Caring, bringing him some soup and checking in on him.

It wasn't hard to fake sick, he felt a bit ill every time he saw his reflection, his haircut was decidedly feminine, while he might have looked a bit girly from certain angles before he rarely got mistaken for one, now it would be lucky if someone thought he was a guy.
153211112121122211112111121.title: Playing sick

Robin turned in and went to sleep. He was done with the day and really needed the reset.

He woke the next day, forgetting about the day before until he saw his reflection. He sneered at his girly looking hair and got another shower. He made another attempt at getting the makeup off his face and got dressed. Luckily for him, John had left for work so he didn't have to interact with him just yet.

He looked at the table and saw a bunch of new bottles of medicine and a note from John telling Robin that he made a few things if he was up for eating.

"Man, he is the perfect boyfriend..." Robin said out loud to himself.

The thought upset him, thinking about how unfair that it was that he couldn't get a girl that was worth his time. He really deserved a girl that treated him right. He caught another glimpse of himself in the living room mirror and looked at his feminine appearance for a moment.

"An actual girl," he said to no one.

Robin spent his day researching that hypnotist and tried to get the info he needed.

He made another attempt at cleaning the remains of his makeup before he stepped out. He grabbed a baseball cap in hopes that it would help make him look more masculine and left for the Hospital.

He spoke with someone at the main lobby and got a visitor's pass but not before being called "miss" a few times. He followed the directions as best he could only getting a little lost. After a bit of searching, he found Rex's room.

Rex was unconcious when he entered the room, though the Nurse told him he should wake up soon, so he waited... and waited...

Finally he seemed to stir out of Conciousness.

"Rex... Rex... You there..."

"Uhhh... Yeah... that's me..."

"Listen I know You must not be feeling to great... so I'll be quick."

Rex makes a sound similar to an uh huh.

"You hypnotized my friend... and then you collapsed and he's... He's still under the hypnosis... Can you fix it... or is there a word to bring him out of it.

Rex is silent for a moment before Muttering "I'm Rex Magnus the magnificent..." before trailing off. and closing his eyes.

Robyn felt some despair, Rex was completely out of it still, unless that was the keyword... but that was unlikely...

He waited around a bit longer maybe he'd come to, but after a bit visiting hours were over, he was asked to leave.

Now Robin just had to decide if He'd head home or if he wanted to stay in town, and find something to do.

15321111212112221111211112121111.content:
Robin saw the time and remembered that he had to be home before John so he could keep up the sick routine. He rushed home and ran into the house. Luckily he got there before John and was able to jump into bed before he arrived.

Robin pretended to be asleep when John poked his head into the room.

"Hey Robyn. How are you feeling?" he asked.

John came in and sat next to him. He rubbed Robin's arm affectionately and Robin faked a cough.''

"Better," he said trying to sound feeble.

"You don't sound better. Have you been able to eat anything?" he asked concerned.

Robin realized then that he hadn't actually eaten yet. His mind had been so preoccupied he simply forgot to.

"No, not yet," Robin said truthfully.

"You think you could try for me? Just a little bit?" He asked hopefully.

Robin's hunger started to come back and he decided now would be a good time.

"Okay," Robin said weakly.

John went into the kitchen and warmed up some of the soup that he had made for Robin and returned with the bowl.

"Thank you," Robin said sitting up and taking the soup.

John leaned in and brushed Robin's pretty bang to the side and kissed his forehead.

"Please get better soon...I love you," with the hesitation of someone saying it for the first time.

Robin felt trapped but seeing the growing worry on his face, he knew he had to respond.

Shit... he wasn't going to the Doctors... Not with John acting like this... guess he'd have to quit the faking sick tomorrow, he'd have to come up with more ways to divert John... Maybe another Double date, they could call up the couple they meet two nights ago at Bowling, Tim and Linda

A checkup wouldn't be bad, right?

Robin sat there and had to enure John's concerned looks and do his best to try and put him at ease.

"See John, everything is fine just a quick shot and I'll be better in no time," He said.

"...and that is the whole story," Robin said exhausted.

It was actually cathartic to get all of that off his chest. Keeping it all inside was driving him crazy. It was a little difficult to get started but it soon snowballed and he just let it all out.

The woman, Mrs. Reed, calmly listened and let him talk. She was a therapist that used to do hypnosis, she had explained to Robin. She told him that she had grown tired of it and went back to school to focus on helping people, not just entertaining them.

"So, are you willing to help?" Robin asked.

"I'm willing to see if I can," she said.

"That's better than nothing," he said, not too happy with her response.

The look she gave him worried him a little. Maybe she was thinking it was a prank or something? He very much hoped that she believed him and could fix things.

1532111121211222111121111212111111112111.title: John comes home and meets Mrs. Reed

1532111121211222111121111212111111112111.content:
Robin waited as Mrs. Reed worked with John. He couldn't make out what it was she was saying to him so he paced in the kitchen. As much as he was embarrassed by the situation, he started to feel really bad for John. Up until now, he had been focused on himself but it was John whose head was played with like some toy. To avoid feeling guilty for putting John in that position in the first place, he concluded that they were both victims. Even so, the guilt was still there.

Robin decided to redouble his efforts for helping his best friend get back to normal. They would even laugh about this later...way later.

Mrs. Reed called him back. John left for the kitchen and Robin sat on the couch.

"Any luck?" Robin asked hopeful.

"Well, there is good new and bad new," Mrs. Reed started.

"I could really use some good news right now but what is the bad news?" Robin fretted.

"The bad news is Rex appears to be better than me. I can't undo the damage he did," See explained.

"Then what is the good news?" Robin said trying not to yell.

"The good news is that I was able to add some triggers of my own that should make life easier for you until Rex can fix John himself," She explained.
1532111121211222111121111212111111112111.title: Mrs. Reed helps somewhat, for now.

choices: Mrs. Reed has Robin try them out to see if they work.
1532111121211222111121111212111111112111.content:
"Understand, Robin, this is only a temporary fix. The more you use the triggers, the less effective they will be later so use them sparingly," She cautioned.

"Okay, sure. What are they?" he asked, eager to know them.

"The first one is 'hold up, big boy'. If he starts getting too touchy for your taste, you say that and he will loose his train of thought," she said.

"That is a little...couldn't it be something else?" Robin asked embarrassed.

"It'd best if the trigger is something that you wouldn't normally say. That way you don't accidentally say it when you don't need to and used it up," she said calmly.

Robin didn't like it but it made sense. He didn't know why he couldn't just say 'purple monkey fan' or something else nonsensical instead.

"Next, 'do you think I'm pretty?'. That will wake him up and set him back to normal of a few moments. It should be enough to get yourself out of any jam you are in," she continued.

Robin wanted to complain about that one. Was she messing with him?

"If things look bad and you need more time, this next one will set him back to normal of a few hours. All you need to do is kiss him on your own. It won't work if he initiates, you will have to do it on your own," She said.

Robin was speechless. Was this what she thought helping was?

Either way, she still had current business to attend to.

He would never tell anyone that, of course, but it wasn't a big deal. Besides, it didn't mean anything. He just liked that his buddy was treating him with affection, that's all.
